Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Position Overview:
Session Leads are industry professionals who provide world-class technical support to our learners in their Nanodegree journey. All our session leads are handpicked through a rigorous selection process so that we can truly be #studentfirst.
As a Session Lead/Instructor, you will be meeting virtually on a weekly basis with your students for group work, activities and short lectures. During the week, students are expected to study an estimated 10 hours on their Nanodegree programs on their own, and you will be expected to respond to their technical questions and check-in with them to make sure they are making progress.
This program is launching in Palestine with students located in (West Bank, Gaza, and East Jerusalem) to grow these learners tech skills and expose them to employment opportunities in the High-Tech industry worldwide.
Required skills/qualifications:
• Residing in Palestine .
• Proficiency in speaking and writing in English and Arabic Language.
• Technical competence: Python, using libraries like NumPy and Pandas, Inferential statistics and probability, SQL, Data Wrangling, and Data Visualization.
• 2+ years of working experience related to the above skillsets.
• Experience teaching technical concepts and public speaking.
• Strong interpersonal skills and confidence to lead a group of students
• Students-oriented mindset and focus on understanding their problems
• Innovative approach and proactivity with students that need help
• Positive character, trusted by the students, creating emotional ties in the group
• Existing tech network and experience in technical conversations & discussions
• Flexibility at their current job to take this challenge part-time as a contractor
• Ability to speak and write in English fluently
• Flexibility at their current job to take this challenge as a part-time, external contractor
Responsibilities:
• Managing weekly Connect sessions with students according to Udacity guidelines
• Creating the Udacity Connect session agenda & notes
• Coordinating between the students and the Udacity Connect team
• Reporting to Udacity the weekly overall attendance status of students & observations about each session
• Being present at every Connect session over Zoom, helping students introduce themselves, organizing students in groups and keeping track of time
• Explaining concepts of the Nanodegree program to your group of students when needed
• Solving questions raised by students during the Connect session
• Reporting student's attendance and progress to the Mentor's dashboard
• Communicating with students on Slack
• Weekly check-in with all students on their progress
Why should you apply?
• Work remotely as an External Contractor
• Earn additional income
• Contribute to a vibrant, international student community
• Stay updated with the latest in cutting-edge technologies

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute a data strategy aligned with the organization's growth objectives, leveraging data analytics and business intelligence tools.
- Lead and manage a team of data analysts, data scientists, and BI specialists, providing guidance, coaching, and support for their professional growth.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product management, finance, and operations, to identify data requirements, establish metrics, and ensure data-driven decision-making throughout the organization.
- Design and implement data collection, storage, and processing systems, ensuring data integrity, security, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR).
- Drive the development and maintenance of data models, dashboards, and reports that provide actionable insights for key stakeholders, enabling informed decision-making.
- Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for business growth and optimization.
- Conduct ad-hoc analyses, data mining, and statistical modeling to support business cases, identify customer behaviors, and improve operational efficiency.
Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in data analytics and business intelligence, and proactively identify opportunities to enhance the organization's capabilities in these areas.
- Collaborate with external partners, vendors, and data providers to ensure access to relevant data sources and tools, and manage relationships effectively. Desired Candidate Profile

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Statistics, Business Analytics).
- Proven experience in a similar leadership role, preferably in a data-driven and growth-focused environment.
- Strong knowledge of data analysis, business intelligence, and data visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI) and database management systems.
- Experience with data warehousing, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes, and data governance practices.
- Proficiency in statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and data mining techniques.
- Excellent leadership and managerial skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire a team to achieve results.
- Strong business acumen and understanding of key growth drivers across various industries. - Effective communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate complex data insights into actionable recommendations for non-technical stakeholders.
- Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional environment and influence decision-making through data-driven insights.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
The opportunity
This opportunity is within our Data & AI team and provides advisory services focused on Data Architecture.
As a Data Architect professional, you will help businesses design and deliver the next generation of data platforms, in order to support their data driven transformation.
You will have to assess their current architecture, identify gaps and strategic goals, identify improvement opportunities and design a roadmap. You will be required to act as a strategic advisory on topics such as data protection, data governance, data migrations, and cloud journey. Your work will require collaboration with other data leaders within the organization such as cybersecurity and data protection team, data analysts and data scientists to ensure that the use-cases have a solid ground and the deliverables can satisfy clients expectations.
In this fast- moving new space you will be the main driver in identifying clients and business development.
This role will be based on our Jordan and Egypt Centre of Excellence and will remotely support MENA client engagements. Based on business need travel will be a requirement.
Your key responsibilities
As a manager, you will be responsible for managing up to two projects alongside senior business leaders such as Directors and Partners and enable clients to determine a FAAS strategy that appropriately addresses risk and manages client expectations relating to deliverables. Help client realized value from data through state-of-the-art data platforms.
The role will also involve ensuring work is delivered timely and in compliance with regulatory requirements, delivering effective execution of the FAAS service delivery framework, working with other service lines in providing an integrated service delivery and monitoring the FAAS engagement team's performance against the budget. You will identify and communicate relevant trends, developments and key performance drivers relevant to the client, consult with appropriate resources on complex accounting issues and participate in sales of new FAAS work.
Skills and attributes for success
Pro- activity, accountability and results- driven people will flourish in this environment. Dealing with competing priorities, understanding how to manage resources and communicating effectively are key skills. This will have a huge impact on those around you and help promote a positive work ethic.
To qualify for the role, you must have
• A bachelor's degree and approximately 8+ plus years of related work experience
• Data Architecture Certifications are a must for the role, and will be a key differentiation factor in the candidate selection
• Demonstrated work experience of at least 5+ years in a global consulting firm handling a team of at least 4 people
• Have hands-on experience on big data, and platforms such as Cloudera, Informatica, Data bricks and on cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS
• Have industry expertise in at least one or two of those domains: Government, Healthcare, Financial Services, Retail, Telecom
• Demonstrated ability to manage and supervise teams through all phases of the project lifecycle, including requirements definition, business re-engineering, and application mapping.
• Awareness about emerging technologies like Data Fabric, Data Mesh, event driven architectures
• Strong technical skills and recognized cautious risk management ability
• Deep understanding of the client's industry and marketplace
• Flexibility and willingness to travel on short notice, as necessary
Ideally, you ll also have
• Track record with a leading consulting firm
• Proficiency in the Arabic language
What we look for
We are interested in ambitious leaders, who want to grow within the organization, are team players and are passionate about impacting clients and communities through the application of data and advanced technologies. We are interested in leaders with entrepreneurial mindset, who are accountable for their business results, and can help grow a new generation of talents within the organization.
What we offer
We offer a competitive compensation package where you ll be rewarded based on performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. Plus, we offer:
• Continuous learning: You ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
• Success as defined by you: We ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
• Transformative leadership: We ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
• Diverse and inclusive culture: You ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
• Develop, automate and maintain the internal reports and dashboards using all available
• tools (Transact-SQL development, Microsoft Business Intelligence stack tools).
• Provide strong reporting and analytical information support to management team
• Generate and distribute management reports in accurate and timely manner
• Analyze business information to identify process improvements for increasing business efficiency and effectiveness
• Presenting highly accurate data to meet the user s needs.
• Enhance the existing information systems and management reports to meet the key business information requirements.
• Work innovatively while keeping abreast of latest technologies relevant to the role as well as to cultivate long-term strategic goals for MIS reports in conjunction with end users, managers, and other stakeholders
• Maintain data integration across various systems related to the required reports.
• Help MIS analysts in monitoring the quality, accuracy, and credibility of the data used for business intelligence.
• Design and implement the Data Management foundation layer to facilitate mapping business requirements into implemented solutions in a minimal time frame.
• Develop MIS documentation to allow for smooth operations and easy system maintenances
• Coordinate the process of generating visualizations products such as dashboards, charts and infographics that show findings, summarized and customized information to present to top management, business teams, other organization s departments and public Data Quality Control
• Quickly respond and provide solutions to MIS problems at central and provincial level.
• Maintain the current MIS system which includes changes to be made from time to time as per requirements
• Liaise with business stakeholders to collect business requirements, perform feasibility studies and impact analysis for changes on Management Information System
• Provide accurate and high-quality deliverables based on thorough understanding of business logic and requirements
• Assisting all teams in preparing various Ad hoc reports
• Be responsible for in-depth data analysis and database design, testing and implementation
• Ensure all projects are delivered in compliance of internal audit, technology risk and external regulators requirements
• Coordinate with different internal teams and external vendors to achieve project deliverables
• Make sure development/implementation are carried out as per plan and any unexpected delay occurring are communicated with team leader or unit head as soon as possible.
Requirements:
• Bachelor s degree or higher in Computer science, Computer Engineering or equivalent degrees in Data Analysis.
• 3+ years experience in developing and implementing enterprise-scale reports and dashboards.
• Extensive experience with Transact-SQL development and data warehouse implementations.
• Experience in Microsoft Business Intelligence stack using SSRS, SSAS and SSIS
• Experience in Data visualization tools like Power BI or Tableau

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB SUMMARY Manages the hotel s day-to-day Accounting function, assisting the Director of Finance in providing financial leadership to the business and clear structure and direction to the Finance team. Primary responsibilities include preparation and analysis of the financial reports and reconciliations, internal and external reporting, budgeting/forecasting, audit and control, asset and liability reconciliation, working capital and cash control. CANDIDATE PROFILE Education and Experience Full/part-qualified accounting qualification or Bachelor's degree (B. A.) from four-year College or University; or three years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience. Hotel accounting experience is essential, operational experience is also preferred but not essential. SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE Hotel Operational Finance knowledge previous Asst DOF or smaller hotel Director of Finance Numeracy - using mathematics to solve problems, calculations, presentations etc. Computer Skills Strong computer skills, particularly Excel and preferably Opera, PeopleSoft, Micros Reading Comprehension - Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work related documents. Writing - Communicating effectively in writing as appropriate for the needs of the audience. Economics and Accounting - Knowledge of economic and accounting principles and practices, P&L statements, operating budgets, forecasting and scheduling, and the reporting of financial data. Management of Financial Resources - Determining how money will be spent to get the work done, and accounting for these expenditures. Analytical/Critical Thinking - The ability to gather and organize information using a logical and systematic process; recognize patterns and relationships in complex data; examine data to identify implications, problems and draw appropriate conclusions; generate alternative solutions to problems; evaluate strengths, weaknesses and consequences of alternative solutions and approaches to solving problems. Administration and Management - Knowledge of business and management principles involved in strategic planning, resource allocation, human resources modeling, leadership technique, production methods, and coordination of people and resources Purchasing and Materials Management - Knowledge of practices and procedures needed to maintain material, equipment and supplies; including vendor identification and contract negotiation, supply requisition and purchasing, and inventory control (e.g., accounting and budgeting). CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Achieving Business Results Supports strategies and conducts activities to drive financial results, guest satisfaction, human capital index and market share. Effectively manages the day to day operation of Accounting to execute finance and accounting responsibilities for the property. Assists the DOF in developing the annual business plan, budgets, forecasts, financial reports, tax compliance, and profit and loss statements. Works through own team and influencing department managers to ensure appropriate controls are in place to manage business risks. Assists in the hiring of accounting associates, and development and retention of a diverse high caliber workforce to provide strong functional expertise to the property and the discipline. Sustains a work environment that focuses on fair and equitable treatment and associate satisfaction to enable business success. Supporting Profitability and Revenue Goals Meets Report Delivery Deadlines Submits reports in a timely manner, ensuring delivery deadlines. Verifies P&L Accuracy Verifies that profits and losses are documented accurately, in line with Marriott Processes and procedures. Communicates with and provides information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person. Demonstrates leadership by using interpersonal and communication skills to lead, influence, and encourages others; advocates sound financial/business decision making; demonstrates honesty/integrity; leads by example. Achieves and and exceeds goals including performance goals, budget goals, team goals, etc. Demonstrates knowledge of job-relevant issues, products, systems, and processes. Develops specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish work and the work of the finance team. Generates and provides accurate and timely results in the form of reports, presentations, etc. Analyzes information and evaluates results to choose the best solution, solve problems and make decisions.. Informs and/or updates the executives, peers and subordinates on relevant information in a timely manner. Verifies that all Taxes are current, collected and/or accrued. Monitors all taxes that apply, ensuring that taxes are current, collected and/or accrued. Processes information; compiles, codes, categories, calculates, tabulates, audits, or verifies information or data. Evaluates information to determine compliance with standards, using relevant information and individual judgment to determine whether events or processes comply with laws, regulations, or standards. Updates and uses relevant knowledge, keeps up-to-date technically and applying new knowledge to job. Assists in Conducting Strategic Planning and Decision Making Communicates financial concepts in a clear and persuasive manner that is easy to understand and drives desired behaviors. Advises the Cluster Executive committee on existing and evolving operating/financial issues. Provides on going analytical support (e.g. monitoring the operating department s actual and projected sales and profit and coaches management team to ensure financial goals are met and opportunities are identified and addressed). Provides assistance to the Cluster DOF in developing the annual business plan, budgets and monthly forecasts. Provides analytical support during budget reviews to identify cost saving and productivity opportunities. Provides direction and assistance to other organizational units regarding accounting and budgeting policies and procedures, and efficient control and utilization. Orients hotel managers to the accounting function and coaches to effectively manage their department s financial performance. Produces accurate and timely financial reports to support effective decision making.

Date: Sep 1, 2023

Centrale Danone is looking for its new  Procure To Pay Manager (M/F)

Lead the AP team as well as all those involved in the P2P process on a daily basis to ensure the processing of invoices and compliance with payment deadlines agreed with suppliers, in full compliance with the group's management rules,
Ensure compliance with the monthly schedule for closing supplier accounts, analysis and justification of supplier account balances.

BAC+4 / BAC+5 in Finance with solid knowledge of accounting and tax rules.

You have a solid knowledge of the local accounting and tax rules in force for the management of the P2P scope,
You have a solid knowledge of P2P processes and systems,
You are oriented towards data management optimization
Technical English
 
Behavioral skills:

You have an analytical mind,
You are a force of suggestion,
You promote teamwork and the sharing of ideas,
You demonstrate leadership,
You are autonomous.
 
 
“Every time we eat and drink, we vote for the world we want to live in”

A key player in the  agri-food sector , we support millions of consumers day after day for several generations, and bring them natural benefits and pleasure, at all stages of their lives, with our flagship brands: Danone, Centrale, Jamila, Danette, etc.

Thanks to our capacity for innovation, the know-how of our employees and the modernization of our constantly evolving production tools, we have made total quality our corporate culture.

At  Centrale Danone , we have a mission: to bring quality nutrition to as many people as possible. If you also want to make it yours, join us and actively contribute to the development of our brands! !

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

We help the world run better
Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.Apply now!
About the team
The EMEA Digital Hub is at the core of the SAP Digital Strategy to scale its market coverage efficiently with velocity while offering memorable digital customer experiences. Our Digital Hub operations cover the entire customer lifecycle digitally from Cairo, Dublin and Barcelona leveraging the world s best digital modalities, and housing and graduating the next generation of digital-native, high performing talent.
The Digital Hub Location in Cairo is growing fast and is at the forefront to digitally service the Middle East and African customers and partners. Within the hub, the Demand Intelligence Team is a critical component of the Demand Generation engine, providing insight and support to the teams in charge of demand generation execution.
Summary and role information
As Digital Demand Associate (DDA) and member of the Demand Intelligence Team (DIT) in the Digital Hub in Cairo, you will play a critical role to uncover the addressable market for SAP, strengthen the data foundation in support of the demand generation engine and support the readiness of digital demand generation campaigns.
You will work hand in hand with the Demand Managers, Sales and Sales Development Managers in the planning, preparation, and follow up of demand generation campaigns.
In this role, you will:
Validate and improve the data quality throughout the demand generation process: account validation and cleansing of firmographic data,
Create target account lists with intelligent segmentation tools,
Profile account contacts to prepare demand generation campaigns.
Furthermore, you will be part of the EMEA DDA community and have the chance to interact with DDAs from other Market Units.
Experience / role requirement:
We re looking for someone who is a self-starter, result oriented, and curious by nature.
A glass-half-full person who strives both as a team player and in delivering high quality work in a fast paced environment.
Bachelor or Master degree with interest in sales or business development in the Software Industry
Fluent in English and Arabic, both written and oral
Can work daily in the Digital Hub office in Cairo
Great analytical skills combined with strong interpersonal abilities
Strong Knowledge of Microsoft Office suite, especially MS Excel
Strong team player as well as the ability to work independently, learn and adapt quickly, take ownership
Attention to detail as well as striving to deliver high quality work and results within tight deadlines
We build breakthroughs together
SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.
We win with inclusion
SAP s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone regardless of background feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.
SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careerssap
For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.
EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:
Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
General Overview:
Our client a Leading Insurer in KSA is looking to hire a Chief Underwriting Officer to join their team in Riyadh. The successful candidate will lead P&C Underwriting by directing overall portfolio risk assessment, underwriting automation activities, and assessing client profiles to appropriately generate premiums.
Key Responsibilities:
• Lead the establishment and execution of the Department s annual plan, budget, objectives, and initiatives in line with the Company's strategic objectives and set KPIs.
• Direct the department s operations and activities within budget and devise strategies that result in a positive financial impact.
• Ensure technical profitability of Property and Casualty underwriting portfolio and enable comprehensive portfolio management program.
• Define and manage the underwriting governance process, including quality assurance, authority delegation, underwriting reviews, accumulation controls, etc.
• Manage risk appetite and monitor capital absorption through control/optimization of portfolio make-up and diversification.
• Support in product development and management (i.e., including annual product reviews, etc.) as well as in the management of product offerings and solutions structuring.
• Oversee market research and screening to ensure appropriate analysis of competitor insurance prices, customer price sensitivity, underwriting trends, forecasted risks, etc.
• Actively participate in drive management of relationships with key market stakeholders (customers, brokers, and reinsurers).
• Direct the assessment of customer risk profile using Underwriting manuals, loss/claims history, and predictive analysis to ensure accuracy of analyzing the potential risks that the customer may create.
• Provide guidance in the design and implementation of treaty reinsurance program and manage facultative reinsurance purchase strategy and optimization protocols.
• Lead generation of appropriate policy premium based on analysis, ensuring a safe balance between risk retention and profit generation to aid the line of business in achieving profitability targets while protecting it from adverse risks.
• Respond to queries from regulators, internal and consultative sources.
• Manage referral process and breach resolution protocols.
• Monitor business performance at line of business and product levels, and develop/implement industry best underwriting and loss prevention value proposition and underwriting professionalism standards.
• Provide support to manage net promoter score effectively and efficiently in coordination with Customer Experience.
• Assist in compliance and customer experience development and management when required.
• Liaise with upper management, participate in monthly and quarterly business reviews, and present results where needed.
• Employ analytics and actuarial analysis to drive the development and maintenance of underwriting technical excellence.
• Develop and maintain underwriting pricing methodology (i.e., development of requisite capabilities, protocols, systems, and tools, etc.) as well as comprehensive pricing and portfolio management systems.
• Manage portfolio trends and results, ensuring pricing adequacy at portfolio and Line of Business levels.
• Oversee new and existing products pricing guidelines and provide input/recommendations for potential improvement opportunities.
• Support in product development and management (i.e., including annual product reviews, etc.) as well as in the management of product offerings and solutions structuring.
• Assist with the development of a network of risk management consultant professionals and experts.
• Ensure collection of data such as customer-related information, reports, claims history, background checks, predictable risks, hazards, etc. needed for the pricing analysis and foster ever-improving data quality.
• Direct risk assessments within the underwriting activities including revisions on portfolio, pricing mechanisms, generated premiums, and risks (i.e., retained or avoided risks) to identify continuous improvements.
• Develop and maintain underwriting pricing methodology, including development and integration of requisite capabilities, protocols, systems and tools to facilitate operations and pricing, and to enable rule-based underwriting.
• Oversee risk portfolio throughout the year and review performance to recommend corrective actions for pricing.
• Ensure validation of claim pay-out probability for insurance policies to identify profitable and competitive prices based on the calculated risk.
• Drive talent management and training for Property and Casualty business unit to enhance staff knowledge and capabilities.
• Direct development of appropriate underwriting capacities and capabilities to ensure proper training of staff.
• Develop and nurture talent and expand underwriting knowledge within property and casualty business unit.
• Lead training and succession planning initiatives.
• Direct the development of the Department s policies, processes, and procedures to increase productivity, attain high quality outputs, and cost-effective results in line with relevant regulatory requirements.
• Lead the development, enhancement and implementation of control systems, and the resolution of escalated non-compliance cases.
• Direct the Department s talent acquisition, development, and management activities within the Department.
• Lead setting team members objectives, clarifying expectations, reviewing performance periodically, providing regular feedback, coaching, and confronting unsatisfactory behavior or performance.
• Promote a high-performance and accountability working environment.
Requirements
• A Bachelor s Degree in Management or a related technical subject is required.
• A Master s Degree in Management or equivalent is preferred.
• Associateship and Fellowship-level professional designation is preferred.
• Minimum 11 years of experience in insurance underwriting or actuarial analyses with at least 6 years of experience in a managerial position at line of business/portfolio level at recognized industry-leading company managing multiple underwriting units and with profit and loss responsibility.
• Must have previous experience from an organization registered with Lloyd's of London.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

• Requirements & Summary
Company : Saudi Aramco (ASC)
Skills : Geologist , Geoscience Technician
Experience : 15 + Years
Education : Bachelors/3-5 yr Degree
Location : Saudi Arabia
Aramco energizes the world economy.
Aramco occupies a unique position in the global energy industry. We are the world's largest producer of hydrocarbons (oil and gas), with the lowest upstream carbon intensity of any major producer.
With our significant investment in technology and infrastructure, we strive to maximize the value of the energy we produce for the world along with a commitment to enhance Aramco's value to society.
Headquartered in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and with offices around the world, we combine market discipline with a generations' spanning view of the future, born of our nine decades experience as responsible stewards of the Kingdom's vast hydrocarbon resources. This responsibility has driven us to deliver significant societal and economic benefits to not just the Kingdom, but also to a vast number of communities, economies, and countries that rely on the vital and reliable energy that we supply.
We are one of the most profitable companies in the world, as well as amongst the top five global companies by market capitalization.
Position Description
We are seeking a senior hydrocarbon resource Geomodeler to join Exploration Resource Assessment Dept, who will have specialized expertise in multiple integrated geoscience disciplines to assess hydrocarbon resources using industry standard methods, definitions and guidelines (PRMS). Integration of multidisciplinary data plays a critical role in volumetric assessments to book or update reserves and resources.
ERAD has great influence on the Organization as a part, and on the Company as whole. We aim to meet the demand of hydrocarbon resources and obtain a sustainable amount of oil and gas recovery to replace the ongoing production. ERAD is a fundamental start and end-point for the Exploration Organization, and creates both the framework within which exploration activities are planned and also the assessment of discovered volumes. We look forward to sustaining the kingdom's dominant oil and gas position by growing the proven resources, and increasing the exploration success rate. Furthermore, finding oil and gas resources through strategic exploration methods that integrate the best talent, optimal processes and technologies in a safe and cost-effective manner.
Minimum Requirements
As a successful candidate, you will hold a Bachelor Degree in Geosciences or related field (e.g., Geology, Geophysics, Petrophysics or other related science and engineering fields) is required. An advanced degree is preferred.
You will have a minimum of 15 years of experience. At least 5-10 years of professional experience in 3D static modelling, including an extensive formal experience in 2D and 3D modeling and resource assessment related studies is desirable.
As a subject matter expert you will have;
Strong problem-solving capabilities
Experience in conventional and unconventional reservoirs with respect to reservoir characterization and 3D modeling.
Proficiency in the modeling software packages such as Petrel, Openworks, Gocad, RMS
Knowledge in structural geology, sequence stratigraphy, carbonate and clastic depositional environments and facies development
Understanding of petrophysical data evaluation
Good understanding of industry guidelines and Petroleum Resources Management System (PRMS)
Good communication, report writing and presentation skills in English.
Duties and Responsibilities
The candidate will be required to perform the following:

• Conduct 2D and 3D volumetric resource assessments
• Integrate multidisciplinary data to assess hydrocarbon resources
• Map fluid surfaces and distribution
• Run data analysis and data quality validation throughout different property modeling workflows
• Conduct geostatistical analyses to be utilized in 3D modeling
• QC and validate 3D static models and relevant outputs
• Apply the latest technology and efficient workflows to generate resource assessment work process
• Collaborate with resource petrophysicists, geoscientists and engineers conduct accurate assessments
• Design and implement new tools and techniques to improve the quality and efficiency of 3D modeling processes.
• Train, mentor and develop the young professionals on relevant skills

Job Purpose:
The Manager IST is responsible to lead the information systems, security, system controls, and technology functions for all UAE business units.
Job Responsibilities:
Strategy & Planning

Research new business technologies and IT software to strengthen the organization s computer systems.

Implementing new software projects and computer technologies that support organizational goals and objectives.
Information Technology Controls and Business Continuity
Performs general and application control reviews for information systems.
Performs information control reviews to include system development standards, operating procedures, system security, programming controls, communication controls, backup and disaster recovery, and system maintenance.
Performs reviews of internal control procedures and security for systems under development and/or enhancements to current systems.
Periodically review the ITGC controls across the infrastructure and applications.

Review and analyze existing applications effectiveness and efficiency, and then develop strategies for improving or leveraging these systems.
Cultivate and disseminate knowledge of application-usage best practices.

Design, develop, install, and manage application enhancements and upgrades.
Negotiate contracts with software and service providers.

Develop relationships with internal business functions and external suppliers.

Monitoring the productivity and performance levels of IT employees and conducting performance reviews.

Ensure application, server, and Infrastructure security and best practices.
Ensure systems and infrastructure availability.
Planning future improvements, and suggesting IT solutions to business problems.
Making sure the IT department meets industry standards.
Job Requirements:

Certifications in Information Security and Business Continuity are highly preferred.
Certification in project management or equivalent work experience.
Technically fluent in system development, design, and implementation.
Strong preference for prior Container Terminal or Logistics industry experience.

Minimum 10 years of experience with top-tier ERP solutions such as Oracle or SAP.

Experience in information systems auditing with domain knowledge of both financial and transactional applications is highly preferred.

Ability to efficiently acquire and utilize new skills in response to change.
Ability to manage multiple priorities.
Self-motivated, mature, adaptive to the dynamic business environment, and able to work under pressure.
Excellent communication, organizational, analytical, and administrative skills.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
The Head of Marketing, Cosmoprof & CPHI, will report into the Group Director and will manage a diverse team based in Riyadh. The individual will be a highly motivated, dynamic marketing leader with a track record of commercial collaboration to develop products and positioning reflective of customer demand.
Managing a diverse team of managers, marketing executives and specialist functions the Head of Marketing will be a skilled marketing strategist and be able to drive creativity and enthusiasm in others. The individual needs to be analytical and data orientated with a history of testing and optimisation, but with creative flair and exceptional attention to detail. The candidate should have extensive experience of digital marketing and marketing technology and be accustomed to delivering in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. The individual must be extremely adaptable, accustomed to working with differing market dynamics and be able to guide marketers and steer campaign strategy accordingly.
Key Performance Indicators
• Working alongside commercial leads to develop value propositions and go-to-market strategy
• Ongoing customer insight and engagement strategies
• Overseeing delivery of marketing campaigns in line with business objectives
• Adherence to timelines and budgets
• Marketing KPI report
• To manage a cross functional marketing team which includes marketers from all backgrounds with a diverse range of skills and training
• To design and deliver campaigns for specific projects as and where required
• To act as a change management ambassador, demonstrating a positive and constructive attitude towards challenges and change
Key Responsibilities
LEADERSHIP
• Recommend team structures and delivery solutions based on requirements
• Line manage senior marketers and specialists working across a range of events
• Work with Group Director to ensure right structure, specialisms and level of resources to meet agreed KPI s
• Provide guidance, feedback and inspiration to line reports
• Champion the adoption and optimisation of marketing technology solutions and digital marketing more broadly
• Work with line reports to ensure successful delivery of marketing campaigns in line with agreed KPI s, event and divisional strategy
• Work with line reports to develop skills and competencies and ensure they have a clear development roadmap
• Ensure line reports are competent managers and have the skills and training required to manage junior team members or specialists
• Ensure adoption and optimisation of marketing technology solutions, identify training needs and ensure line reports are technically proficient
• Reflect the high-performance culture of the marketing team
ANALYSIS & INSIGHT
• Monitor campaign performance by supervising the production of relevant and timely reports. Recommend changes to campaign execution based on data insights
• Share relevant insights with sales, event team and senior management to drive revenues or pursue new opportunities
• Analyse and report trends over time and use these insights to build more effective campaigns
• Ensure relevant and timely data is captured (onsite & post show surveys, registration forms, industry research etc)
• Work with internal teams to ensure data governance and data management policies are adhered to
• Ensure delivery and accuracy of pre-agreed reports during and post campaign to monitor channel effectiveness and ROI
• Use recommended campaign analytics dashboards to monitor performance
• Build a culture of testing and metrics-driven decision making in the teams
• Share case studies with marketers within the team, division and Informa Markets
PLANNING & CAMPAIGN MANAGEMENT
• Work with marketing managers/wider team to plan product marketing campaigns to meet strategic objectives for exhibitions and virtual/hybrid events
• Monitor operational implementation plans and ensure adherence to deadlines (including Gantt charts, Time & Action Plans, Content Calendars, Budget Trackers)
• Monitor engagement with target media, associations, industry partners and social media influencers and help the team determine how they fit within the integrated campaign
• Assist marketing managers with the development of marketing budgets in line with plans and ensure budget trackers are kept up to date
• Recommend external suppliers and ensure adherence to contractual terms and delivery
• Work with internal teams and external agencies to deliver digital marketing, social media and PR in line with marketing plans to hit agreed KPI's
• Ensure optimisation of spend across marketing channels
• Agree paid media requirements and guide the negotiation of media buying (either directly or through an agency)
• Recommend website strategy to maximise relevant traffic and conversion
MARKETING EXECUTION
• Together with the marketing managers identify target universe and key segments within target universe
• Guide the team in developing personas, value propositions and messaging for each of the key segments
• Ensure that timely, relevant communications are sent through full mix of channels and that the team are optimising the effectiveness of these channels
• Monitor and recommend adjustments to the digital marketing activity based on performance metrics
• Input into the Content Calendar to ensure delivery through the most relevant channels (email marketing, social media, digital marketing, direct mail etc)
• Input into the PR plan (internal or external) and liaise with the event manager/event director
• Establish relationships with and manage strategically important partners to ensure maximum exposure at lowest cost to show budget
• Ensure the maintenance of active social media channels in line with market expectations, monitor engagement and maximise conversion
• Oversee the design and production of all marketing collateral to be determined within the marketing plan
• Ensure all marketing collateral, email marketing, website content and digital marketing is thoroughly proofed, adheres to brand guidelines and agreed Informa standards Desired Candidate Profile
Qualifications
Qualifications & experience
• Experience in a start-up environment and/or scaling a new business is desirable
Skills & qualities
• Good written and oral communication skills in both Arabic and English is essential
• Excellent quantitative skills
• Excellent Excel, PowerPoint and financial modelling skills
• Strong analytical and presentation skills
• Good attention to detail and accuracy.
• Self-starter with proactive nature, and ability to work autonomously
• Experience using SAP, TM1 (IBM) and/or Oracle would be advantageous
• Highly collaborative
• Thrives on constant change.
• Middle East experience (desirable)
• Relevant sector experience (desirable)

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
About us
Quant, a pioneering Saudi enterprise, leads the charge in digital transformation by leveraging
the vast array of data resources available in the fourth industrial revolution. We are deeply
committed to delivering exceptional Data Science and AI SaaS products and solutions, with a
specialized focus on the real estate sector through Suhail and the retail sector through
Fruits360. Our talented dream team possesses unique expertise, enabling us to achieve a track
record of marvels, from analyzing more than a trillion data records to serving hundreds of clients
across more than 10 industries. Our strategic international and local partnerships alongside our
expertise have positioned us as trailblazers in the global transition towards data-driven
economies.
Job Description
Job Role:
In a digital age where the nearly infinite and extravagant availability of data presents unlimited opportunities, Quant is a key enabler in leveraging this resource, as it is among the first Saudi companies dedicated to offering market-leading Data Science and AI products and solutions. At Quant, we empower aspiring businesses and dynamic governments across industries to become data-driven, allowing them to optimize operations, enhance efficiency, and augment decision-making.
As Head of DevOps At Quant, you will be responsible for leading the development and implementation of automated, efficient, and high-performance delivery systems for a large organization. They will have extensive experience in both development and operations, as well as full-stack expertise.
Job Responsibilities:
• Provide cloud-based continuous delivery solutions and have experience with the core cloud provider management tools.
• Design and implement Continuous Integration tools like Jenkins, GitHub connections, Azure DevOps, Git-lab, and others.
• Use configuration management automation tools like Azure DevOps to build continuous delivery systems.
• Experience deploying and maintaining high-performance production environments using techniques like vertical, horizontal scaling, implementing caching systems, and database clustering.
• Manage database clusters, log stacks, etc. ELK and experience configuring and managing services on Docker Containers, Kubernetes, or Docker Swarm.
• Use industry Continuous Delivery patterns and collaborate to achieve successful continuous delivery solutions.
• Coach and mentor team members, clearly explaining complex solutions and leading and teaching junior staff.
• Manage DataOps, ensuring efficient and reliable data pipelines and data governance practices are in place
• Lead the management and maintenance of SaaS platforms, ensuring high availability and performance of the systems.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement data architecture, data pipeline, and data governance strategies.
• Continuously monitor and optimize the performance of SaaS platforms, and implement necessary changes for scalability and reliability.
Requirements
Preferred Certifications:

Preferred Personal Qualities:
• Critical and logical thinker
• Taking Ownership
• Pragmatic and passionate personality
• Aptitude to work in a diverse environment.

Preferred Business Skillset:

• Excellent communication and leadership skills.
• Software Development.
• Exposure to ERP systems (such as Zoho).
Software Knowledge Required:
• Experience in designing and managing large, complex software operations.
• Strong experience scripting installation, configuration, and provisioning in Python, Java, C#, or another high-level language.
• Proven experience with configuration management automation tools, Continuous Integration tools, and cloud-based delivery solutions.
• Strong understanding of high-performance production environments, caching systems, database clustering, and containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
• Strong experience in managing DataOps and SaaS platforms, with a solid understanding of data governance and data pipeline best practices.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description About us
One team. Global challenges. Infinite opportunities. At Viasat, we re on a mission to deliver connections with the capacity to change the world. For more than 35 years, Viasat has helped shape how consumers, businesses, governments and militaries around the globe communicate. We re looking for people who think big, act fearlessly, and create an inclusive environment that drives positive impact to join our team.
What you'll do
The Real-time Operation Center Supervisor is the owner of the process and infrastructure for the data collection at the rig sites, and controls the accurate aggregation, transmission, storage and delivery of data to the users. You will be responsible to meet the expectations and contract requirements with our customers. You will also lead the teams of Data Analysts and Optimization Engineers.
The day-to-day
• We believe it is important to give you an idea that is as accurate as possible of what you can expect in your role. Some of the tasks are mentioned here but as we believe in Exploring and Evolving, there are always new opportunities as part of the Viasat team!
• Surveying, identifying and procuring the needed material, and deploying the network physical infrastructure within the rig site for connecting the different service providers with the RSDH (Rig Site Data Aggregation Hub), in line with requirements.
• Coordination with IT, Security and Network teams to ensure the needs and requirements are covered and implemented in a timely manner to allow the successful data flow from the Rigs to the end users.
• Provision of the required specifications and configurations needed for the IT hardware, architecture and environments [required for the processes and applications used, included, but not limited to the major service platforms.]
• Be responsible for the identification, collection, capture and communication in real-time of any process deviation or deficiencies within the processes or during the introduction of changes in the processes.
• Maintain up-to-date knowledge on the functionalities and rationale of the different data exchange standards (i.e. WITS0, WITSML) as well as the different support applications used for data collection, aggregation, storage, and visualization.
• Aware of the interrelations between the service platform as well as the various types of users, within the realm of the company's internal IT infrastructure and with full understanding of the organization's partners and their respective roles within the architecture of the services.
• Be responsible for revising and reviewing issue tickets in order to identify major contributors and aspects within the Data Analyst chain to address specific service providers and processes to improve the service delivery.
• Maintain and update Standard Operating Procedure for Field and Onsite Support document to provide updated references for Data Analyst and Optimization Engineer.
• Deployment and testing of various application releases within The Company test server.
• Responsible to gather and explain the list of requirements, improvements or fixes and their criticality to the engineering team, for application releases in production environment.
• Design and deliver user application training, while looking for possible improvements in the overall service delivery process.
• Forecast the team workload by preparing the schedule to ensure accurate service coverage.
• Collaborating closely with all internal and external partners to evolve the processes.
• Coordinate the right access level assignment for the different users of the company.
What you'll need
• +8 years demonstrable experience in similar roles.
• Detailed knowledge of the contractor software / application.
• Available to work on shifts.
• Previous experience in mudlogging or M/LWD or directional drilling.
• Experienced in Well Operations in all its different aspects, in particular on the different sources of High Frequency data implemented at the rig-site, including Rig Instrumentation, Mud Logging, Cementing, M/LWD and other applicable service providers.
What will help you on the job
We are looking for an experienced RTOC Supervisor, looking to support the deployment of sophisticated technologies for our clients, through acute decision making and customer centricity. Additionally, the supervisor is looking to apply their leadership skills to build a safe environment for their team.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description Overview
Are you looking for an exciting opportunity to kick-start your career? As an Invoice Analyst, you will be responsible for booking and analyzing invoices for advertising participation, budget monitoring, and ensuring payment of invoices within the applicable payment deadline. You will work closely with our Key Accounts Managers to ensure seamless operations, and you will have the opportunity to learn and grow in a dynamic work environment.
Responsibilities
• Book invoices for CDAs and Promo invoices on the appropriate budget and module (PS or SD) after checking the imputations transmitted by the key accounts managers
• Check the applicable VAT rate according to the nature of the service
• Pay invoices after validation according to the company's internal procedures.
• Monitor budget by management year.
• Analyze and monitor trade cooperation and NIP budgets highlighting discrepancies and transmit information to Key Accounts Managers
• Set up monitoring and analysis of accounts to understand discrepancies, and year-end landings.
• Ensure the correct receipt of all invoices and ensure the follow-up of accounts with customers and Key Accounts Managers
• Ensure Net sales is consistent along the month
• Prepare all extractions from PS and SD and load the proper bookings in SAP with respect to the timelines
• Reconcile Net Revenue in collaboration with Local FR Team
• Review the Ageing balance 2 times a month (the 15th and 30th), anticipate and set up an action plan if necessary.
• Ensure comprehensive tracking of business cooperation and Promo deductions and claim all deducted invoices from customers to clear accounts as soon as possible
• Make requests to the "data stewards" to open/change the vendor accounts necessary for the booking of invoices.
• Call customers to validate RIBs according to company procedures
• Ensure day-to-day handling of the mail and proceed to its distribution among the various persons in charge.
Qualifications
• Are you a recent graduate looking for your first job? We welcome applicants with 0 to 1 year of experience in a dispute analyst position.
• Do you have a passion for numbers and a love for Excel? We are looking for someone with Advanced Excel skills to join our team.
• Are you fluent in French? Great! We need someone who can communicate effectively with our clients and team members.
• Do you have experience with SAP or similar software? Even better!
• We value logical thinking, attention to detail, and the ability to synthesize information for reporting. Good internal and external interpersonal skills are also essential for this role.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
A Business Analyst in the centralized content commissioning unit is responsible for analyzing and interpreting data to contribute in having corporate decision-making process driven by data. The role typically involves working closely with other Stakeholders (TV, Shahid, Production, Studios ) and various business departments (Marketing, Group Ops, Group Finance, Group Legal ), to identify and evaluate opportunities for growth and improvement.
Responsibilities:
• Gather and analyze data related to market trends, audience demographics, and industry benchmarks.
• Identify and evaluate new business opportunities, for content and acquisitions.
• Develop and maintain financial models to support decision-making and forecasting.
• Create and present reports and presentations to stakeholders, including senior management and other decision-makers.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement new business strategies and initiatives.
• Monitor industry developments and competitor activity to inform business decisions.
• Continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of content titles and make recommendations for improvement.
• Support strategic planning and budgeting processes.
• Contribute in enhancing content data governance, automation and content processes optimization.
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Statistics or a related field.
• Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in a business analyst role, preferably in the media industry.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Experience with financial modeling and data analysis tools such as Excel and Power BI.
• Familiar to international business environment dealing with metadata and various technical systems (ERP, media solutions, etc )
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Strong understanding of the media industry and its trends.
• Experience with market research is a plus.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
• Exchange Server Management: Deploy, configure, and manage Microsoft Exchange Server infrastructure, including mailbox databases, client access servers, transport servers, and connectors.
• User Management: Create, modify, and remove user mailboxes and distribution groups. Manage mailbox permissions, email addresses, and distribution lists.
• Email Security: Implement and maintain security measures to protect against spam, malware, and unauthorized access. Monitor email traffic for potential threats and take necessary actions to mitigate risks.
• Email Policies and Compliance: Establish and enforce email policies, retention policies, and archiving procedures to ensure regulatory compliance and data governance.
• Backup and Recovery: Perform regular backups of Exchange databases and implement disaster recovery strategies to minimize data loss and downtime.
• Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Monitor Exchange Server performance, analyze bottlenecks, and optimize system resources to ensure optimal performance and responsiveness.
• Patch Management: Keep Exchange Server and related components up to date with the latest security patches and updates.
• Troubleshooting: Investigate and resolve issues related to email delivery, connectivity, and client access. Provide timely support for user-reported problems.
• Collaborate with IT Teams: Work closely with other IT teams, including network administrators, system administrators, and security specialists, to ensure smooth integration and operation of the Exchange environment.
• Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation for the Exchange Server infrastructure, configurations, and procedures.
• Capacity Planning: Monitor resource utilization trends and plan for future growth and expansion of the Exchange environment.
• User Training: Provide guidance and training to end-users on using Exchange features effectively and securely.
Responsibilities Teams Voice:
• Complete PBX migration via Microsoft Teams Enterprise voice
• Provide Microsoft Teams solution design, plan and delivery in complex and regulated locations with multiple separate legal entities collocated in the same site.
• To create or validate inter-relationships between PBX users in same or different sites and to design corresponding MS Teams features and dependencies;
• To create/validate PBX to Enterprise Voice migration plan, to ensure all deployments meet the level of readiness as stipulated by the user migration team.
Job Qualifications:
• Knowledge about Unified Communications / Collaboration industry standards & trends
• Strong presentation skills in verbal and written communication,
• Skills and proven experience with following products:
• MS Teams Voice
• SIP Protocol
• MS Teams endpoints including but not limited to IP phones
• Powershell
• Knowledge about various PBXs including but not limited to Avaya, Cisco, Session Border Controllers & Media Gateways SIP trunks (Centralized, Local)
• Microsoft Exchange Unified Messaging
• Knowledge of all Microsoft Cloud PBX features and system/user administration.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent experience).
• Proven experience as an UC Engineer or similar role.
• In-depth knowledge of Microsoft Exchange Server, including different versions (e.g., Exchange Server 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019, or Microsoft 365 Exchange Online).

Roles & Responsibilities

• Analyze current technologies used within the company and determine ways to improve
• Provide detailed specifications for proposed solutions
• Document and monitor requirements needed to institute proposed updates
• Assure systems compliance to cyber security and data governance measures and guidelines
• Building and integrating information systems to meet the organization needs
• Assessing the systems architecture currently in place and working with technical staff to recommend solutions to improve it

• Inform various stakeholders about any issues with the current technical solutions being implemented

Requirements

• Previous project management experience is advantageous
• In-depth understanding of coding languages
• Sound knowledge of various operating systems and databases
• Efficient communication skills
• Strong organizational and leadership skills
• Bachelor s degree in information technology or computer science is preferred
• Experience developing IT and cloud infrastructure
• Experience in software engineering and design architecture
• Advanced understanding of business analysis techniques and processes

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Role Purpose:
The Manager Organization Design & HC Projects is responsible for vetting and overseeing organizational design across Majid Al Futtaim Retail while collaborating with Country Human Capital teams to build workforce and talent archetypes which enable greater business synergies. The role holder is also responsible for supporting the HC Organizational strategy through effective project management and collaboration with the Human Capital teams in the respective countries, and overseeing the effective implementation of Organizational Effectiveness special projects across the organization while ensuring efficient data capabilities across Majid Al Futtaim Retail.
Role Details Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities:
Organizational Design
• Maintain the global workforce plan including expansion to ensure the optimal organizational design and business archetypes.
• Ensure the appropriate role profiles index availability as per guidelines, maintain and update whenever necessary, and communicate changes with relevant stakeholders.
• Collaborate with the countries to recommend structures in alignment with the organization s overall strategic objectives and Human Capital vision.
• Partner globally with the HCBPs across the countries to ensure proper change management for new initiatives and group wide projects .
• Partner with functional leaders on organization effectiveness and planning initiatives such as developing operating models, manpower planning and organizational structures.
• Collaborate with Total Rewards team to ensure roles are evaluated/graded correctly.
Organizational Effectiveness
• Ensure and contribute to ongoing process improvements aligned with a lean and robust mindset to ensure continuous performance improvement.
• Create and support the development of compelling workforce stories and actionable insights through human capital business intelligence and data visualization .
• Develop data-driven analysis to support decision strategic decision making for H C and Business initiatives , including organization mobility & career evolution of employees to fuel the proposed organization designs, archetypes, and pipelines.
• Enhance the capability to analyze and "make sense" of large sets of data and translate findings in a visually appealing manner that tell a story and help us make better data driven decisions .
• Engage and collaborate with cross-functional experts across all business units .
• Support the design of HC Dashboards across all HC functions and countries.
• Collaborate with members of H C to identify, standardize and implement data & analytics solutions, including enhanced tools and process improvements .
• Participate in the development and implementation of the Data Governance function partnering with key stakeholders .
• P artner globally with the HCBPs across the countries to ensure proper data visualization and data driven insights regarding new initiatives and group wide projects .
• Partner closely with Talent Management team to ensure high - performing talent in key roles talent through data driven insights and recommendations.
• Manage the interaction with internal departments and across countries to ensure that all internal stakeholders are aligned and informed for project success
• Liaise with vendors and related third parties that may be involved with the project delivery
Human Capital Responsibilities
• Assist with the implementation of the performance management process by setting objectives, monitoring performance, and provide constructive feedback and provide inputs to senior management
• Provide mentorship for the purpose of developing a continuous talent pipeline for key roles
• Provide inputs on training needs and coordinate with the HC department to ensure facilitation of training requirements
• Develop and implement on the job-training for the team
• Provide inputs for the development of annual manpower plan
• Ensure the implementation of MAF Retail s corporate policies and relevant procedures
Financial Responsibilities
• Monitor allocated budget to ensure compliance and take corrective measures when necessary.
• Provide inputs on the development of annual budget.
• Develop necessary measures towards continuous reduction of the operational cost.
Disclaimer: This role description reflects the general details considered necessary to describe the principal responsibilities of the role identified and shall not be construed as an exhaustive description of all the work requirements inherent to success in the role.
Definition of Success:
• Quality of research and reports
• Project is completed in accordance with approved quality
• Meeting project specification and requirements
• Timeliness and accuracy of activities
Personal Characteristics and Required Background:
Minimum Qualifications/education
• Bachelor s Degree in Business Administration or Human Capital Management
• Master s Degree is preferred
• Professional HR Certification such as CIPD and/or SHRM is preferred
Minimum experience
• 8+ years of relevant experience in a Human Capital/OD role
• 3 + years in Retail or similar industry.
Skills
• Strategic perspective able to think about the human capital and organization objectives from the point of view of multiple functions/stakeholders.
• Strong communication and presentation skills.
• Able to lead the entire range of problem solving work from problem definition to analysis, recommendation and the development of implementation plans.
• Able to work collaboratively with key internal and external leaders, partners, suppliers and customers
• Ability to inspire and engage others in a long-term vision of Majid Al Futtaim Retail.
• Excellent organizational and time management skills with the ability to work under pressure, balancing conflicting demands and meeting tight deadlines.
• Personal integrity and the ability to invoke trust and respect.
• English (Full professional proficiency - Required); Local language preferred

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

An exciting opportunity is available for Specialist, Cataloguing Located in Jubail, KSA
Job Purpose
To classify materials based on their categories such as operational spares, Insurance, General Spares, Consumables, etc. Additionally, to identify and link spares to associate equipment tag numbers To validate, inspect, control and load information into materials masters using existing ERP template or create a new template in accordance with the protocols of cataloguing procedures
Role responsibilities:
• Ensure compliance to all relevant safety, quality and environmental management procedures and control, within a defined area of activity to guarantee employee safety, legislative compliance, delivery of high-quality products/service and a responsible environmental attitude.
• Ensure compliance with EHSM, IMRS and Responsible care. Section Management
• Performs the commonality and duplicate resolution of spares.
• Update specific inspection of spares in the material master inspection using the recommendation of the end users.
• Shall take efforts in coordination with Procurement and Maintenance end user to identify the spares which can be procured locally to substitute imports.
• Create and maintain material master data thru MDG (Material Data Governance).
• Create and maintain bill of materials in coordination with the end user.
• Review and ensure that collected material master data is complete and meets the required standards.
• Data cleansing and enrichment.
• Maintain Data Consistency, Configuration and accuracy in accordance with established protocols and conventions.
• Used data supplied by supplier/ manufacturer/ end user to enter catalogue records
• Check to ensure that the item doesn't already exist in the inventory.
• Maintain Material Data Integrity and accuracy.
• Prepare ad-hoc/periodic reports of activities as required by management.
• Communicate with Global Material Cataloguing in the management of the SAP Material Master function (MDG SAP Power User). Acting as a point of contact for business queries.
• Communicate with maintenance operations and supplier with the consent of procurement.
• Communicate with SAP consultant for any issues related to the material master.
• Align with the Material management section for any changes in material master such as stock levels, criticality and all MRP attributes.
• Align with the Warehouse Management for the proper storage type allocation of spares.
• Direct report to Superintendent, Warehouse
• As a senior member of the maintenance department team contribute to the formulation and implementation of section strategy and plans, to achieve the department needs and objectives.
• Attend daily meetings with Warehouse staff, to ensure continued operability of the WH-operations and discuss improvements in processes.
• Intervene in cases of in top urgent/emergency material requests to ensure that plants return online in the quickest possible.
• Review the data analysis (materials consumption, OSDE, OSDR, overall inventory and forecasted demand) for different spare parts prepared by the team to ensure that all parts are readily available to minimize downtime.
• Assist the Plant Maintenance emergency shutdowns, planned shutdowns and TAMs by providing the enquired services to insure optimum business continuation.
• Oversee the effort to involve external support (vendors or suppliers) or other departments called in by the supervisors to lend technical expertise.
Qualification and Requirements:
• 8-15 years experience in relevant experience in the relevant Industry.
• Bachelor s Degree in Engineering OR Diploma

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Purpose
To ensure effectiveness & efficiency in the bank s process of financial control and assist in relevant cost management MIS reporting.
To be engaged in regulatory reporting, financial reporting and control aspects of the Bank (including NBF Islamic) and its subsidiaries (NBF Financial Services and NBF Capital Limited) and to ensure effective financial / regulatory reporting including statutory consolidated financial statements.
Key Accountabilities
Financial Reporting
Preparation of the monthly accounts / presentations and yearly financial statements of the Group and subsidiaries ensuring compliance with IFRS / IAS (including NBF Islamic);
To produce accurate and informative accounting and financial reports for internal and external stakeholders.
Responsible for the evaluation of new IRFS / IAS and regulatory requirement implications on the Bank.
Liaison with the External, Internal and Central Bank Auditors
Subsidiaries Reporting:
1. NBF Capital Limited financials and books of accounts
2. NBF Financial Services FZC financials and books of accounts
Regulatory Reporting (CBUAE BRF)
Accruals and prepaid expenses monitoring and management.
GL ownership framework compliance and products testing (including NBF Islamic) - Ensuring initiation / execution of the respective level of controls to enhance the control environment. Undertaking product testing from Finance perspective and ensuring seamless reflection in the system from GL / financial / accounting related matters.
Month End Processing
Responsible for the preparation of the policies and procedures manuals and ensuring the accuracy and integrity of financial information with enhanced analysis.
New initiatives / projects
Cost Effective Budget and Planning
Team Engagement
Staff engagement and liaison.
Other Accountabilities
Other Accountabilities
COMMUNICATIONS & WORKING RELATIONSHIP S:
Internal:
Staff of Business and Functional units. Accruals and prepaid expenses monitoring and management.
Periodic meetings with respective departments to provide financial guidance and advice on strategies to meet overall bank s objectives.
Periodic meetings with Internal Audit on issues relating to policies and procedures.
Consult IS&T for system related issues.
External:
Periodic meeting with external auditors in lieu of the financial statements, Central Bank Returns and other specific issues.
Job Context
GL ownership framework compliance and products testing; Control and Governance / GL controls (including NBF Islamic)
Feasibility study and product / channel support (incorporating PPG, Financial Projections analysis and testing of products).
Education
Post Graduate in Finance/ MBA Finance
Experience and Skills
Working and collaborating with others
Building relationships, building trust, sharing knowledge, setting expectations, providing support and facilitating cooperation.
Change and Innovation
Flexible and constantly seeking new ways to approach job requirements and challenges; to adjust rapidly to new situations.
Communication
Delivering clear, proactive and effective communication to expand understanding and influence others.
Results Orientation
Consistently driving the achievement of results, displaying high levels of energy, commitment and resilience.
Evaluating and Solving Challenges
Conducting detailed analysis of data, information and situations, performing cause and effect analysis, making effective, timely and fair decisions.
Technical Competencies
Financial, Regulatory Reporting and Compliance- Finance- Proficient
Financial Control and Accounting- Finance- Proficient
Financial Analysis and Performance Management- Finance- Advanced

Asset Liability Management and Market Intelligence- Finance- Basic
