Communication - Proficient
Evaluating and Solving Challenges - Proficient
Results Orientation - Proficient
Working and collaborating with others - Proficient

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Digital Consultant
We are currently searching for a Digital Consultant to join our consulting team in Riyadh
Buro Happold s newly formed Digital Advisory team focuses on delivering technology and information transformation to clients to enhance their financial, environmental and social performance (the triple-bottom-line).
Our projects vary considerably; from defining the smart city technologies that will transform the resident, worker or visitor experience, to developing a sophisticated data-driven 3D model of a university campus to determine the most effective route to net zero carbon, to outlining the team, processes and policies required for our clients to manage data quickly and securely... However, all our projects have engineering or real-world asset expertise at their core and it is that, with our relentless focus on the triple-bottom-line that makes us unique.
The team works across a range of consulting areas including strategy, business case development, program management, data, governance, solution development, innovation and change management. We are looking for consultants who want to collaborate with other offices, our experts in design, and technologists internally and externally to make a real-world difference.
Type of contract
Permanent
Grade
Consultant
Area of Expertise
Digital Advisory
Region
Middle East, India and Asia
Office / Project Location
Riyadh
Ref No
7024
What will you be doing

• Conduct research and analysis of client needs, industry trends, and competitor strategies
• Supporting the team with project delivery as required
• Support the development of comprehensive digital strategies that align with client business goals and objectives
• Assist in client advise on the latest digital technologies and trends
• Present recommendations to key internal or external stakeholders in a clear and concise manner
• Collaborate with other team members to ensure that recommendations are fully integrated and aligned with overall business objectives
• Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and continuously enhance your knowledge and skills to remain a thought leader in the field
What will I need to be successful?
• Digital Strategy, innovation, transformation and/or relevant background.
• Experience with project management using methodologies e.g. MSP, Design-led thinking or others.
• Specific experience, content knowledge and practice in at least one of: digital innovation, digital strategy development, vision and roadmap development, business case development, digital procurement strategy and management, enterprise or IT architecture, operating models and organisation structure design, program advisory, governance, information management.
• Understanding of construction process and / or experience within built environment would be beneficial.
• Strong proficiency in Excel and Powerpoint.
• Bachelor's or master's degree in engineering, IT, Business or other related field.
• Relevant digital or business (CA, ACA, MBA) professional qualification.

Be you at Buro Happold
Buro Happold is proud to be a practice of a diverse range of professionals. We actively promote inclusivity to enable every individual to reach their full potential, the more inclusive we are the better our work will be.
We are working to change the lack of representation of minority groups in the built environment, and are particularly keen to hear from anyone who feels they are underrepresented in the industry. We have much to learn from one another. Embracing difference allows us to develop the most innovative and elegant solutions.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Job Purpose
• Provide advice regarding the optimization of Operations Group technical and business processes through the implementation of structured continuous improvement, best practices, cost optimization, benchmarking and QGMS stewardship processes and tools.
• Facilitate planning and development of the Operations Group Business Plan and Long-term Strategies Roadmap and its Stewardship.
Job Context & Major Challenge(s)
• Role requires an in-depth understanding of the Operations Group Core Business objectives procedures, programs and policies and corresponding business data (safety, quality, financial and operational).
• Determine own work methods and provide direction and support to team members.
• Interface amongst internal and external stakeholders and manage conflicts that may arise in order to provide and receive optimum recommendations and feedback.
Key Job Accountabilities - I
• Create, implement, enhance and revise relevant processes and procedures, continuous improvement (CI) guidelines, best practices, cost optimization and benchmarking to define overall governance strategy and support its implementation.
• Support the implementation of governance strategy, providing stewardship and refinement of corresponding documentation.
• Act as a process enabler to drive CI opportunity identification by conducting workshops, focus group discussions, process assessments and health checks.
• Share expertise in Six Sigma and Lean methodology by providing mentoring and coaching to cascade these CI skills from Operations Excellence to the entire Operations Group.
• Develop and enhance data governance and management processes to support Operations Group efficiencies. Utilize relevant statistical tools and comparative techniques to support objective reporting and decision making.
Key Job Accountabilities - II
• Lead workshops to identify cost optimization opportunities and steward through to implementation to sustain savings in the long term.
• Oversee multiple projects to ensure plans are carried out in coordination with subject matter experts and in adherence with CI governance guidelines and company project management standards.
• Provide inputs, analyse results and identify improvement opportunities or focus areas supporting corporate benchmarking efforts through external organizations.
• Facilitate Operations Leadership engagement in the development of QGMS L3 processes and ensure effective alignment between stakeholders and highlight challenges to the Operations Leadership Team for resolution.
• Provide expertise for the development and implementation of an Operations Support Business Continuity Plan as per the defined process.
• Lead the development, implementation and stewardship of the Operations Group strategic planning and KPI reporting process and ensure effective collaboration in the development and stewardship of the Operations roadmap.
• Develop dashboards and Insight Analytical Tools and programs and provide expertise in developing insight analysis cases based on group performance and key priorities.
Qualifications
• Bachelor s degree in Engineering or equivalent.
Knowledge and/or Experience
• 8 years experience within Operations, Maintenance, or Engineering functions.
• Experience in the implementation of Continuous Improvement programs.
• Lean 6 Sigma certification with experience on Lean 6 Sigma projects.
• Experienced in implementing benchmarking programs and identification of improvement plans based on outcome.
• Experienced in the development of Business / Strategic planning Models and KPI Governance processes.
Technical and Business Skills
• Proficient in written and spoken English.
• Proficiency in the use of MS Office Suite and the application of statistical software such as JMP or Minitab.
• Experienced in the use of Dashboarding / Analytics Models, Proficiency preferred.
• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills.
• Good project management skills.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Responsibilities
Conduct comprehensive security assessments and risk analyses to identify gals against information and cybersecurity standards.
Perform compliance assessment.
Collaborate with clients and internal teams to develop and implement information security policies, standards, and procedures.
Perform security audits to evaluate the effectiveness of security controls and systems.
Analyze and interpret security assessment findings, and provide recommendations for remediation.
Strong knowledge on data governance, data privacy regulations and protection requirements.
Advise on security best practices, industry standards, and emerging trends to enhance the organization's security posture.
Develop and deliver security awareness training programs to educate employees about information security practices and policies.
Comprehensive knowledge on security incidents and process flow to respond to security breaches or other cybersecurity-related issues in a timely manner.
Evaluate and recommend security practices and solutions, such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and encryption tools.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure security requirements are integrated into system development lifecycle processes.
Stay up to date with the latest security threats, vulnerabilities, and technologies through continuous learning and professional development.
Preferred Candidate Profile
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. Relevant certifications (e.g., CISSP, CISM, CISA) are highly desirable.
Proven experience in information security consulting or a similar role, preferably in diverse industries.
Deep understanding of information security principles, risk management, and industry best practices.
Familiarity with security frameworks and standards (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST, PCI-DSS).
Strong knowledge of management policy development
Strong knowledge on technical policy development - network security, application security, encryption technologies, and secure coding practices.
Experience with security assessment tools and techniques, interpreting results from vulnerability scanning and penetration testing and translating into gaps.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex security risks and provide practical recommendations.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with clients, stakeholders, and technical teams.
Ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines.
Ethical and professional conduct with a commitment to maintaining confidentiality and integrity.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Business Planner, Content Commissioning Unit (CCU)
MBC company is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Business Planner to join its Content Commissioning Unit. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating, implementing and monitoring business plans for the unit, documenting and optimizing processes, and ensuring that goals are met and objectives are achieved.
Responsibilities:
• Evaluate current business processes and identify areas for improvement.
• Document all processes, creating detailed step-by-step guides and procedures to ensure that they can be easily followed and understood by all employees.
• Collaborate with department managers and other stakeholders to ensure that new processes are effectively integrated into the company's operations.
• Develop and implement business plans to achieve department goals and objectives.
• Assist the team in other internal functions such content performance review processes., strategic planning, metadata, compliance, content policy, etc .
• Manage the financial aspects of the content commissioning unit, including budgeting, forecasting, and reporting on performance.
• Monitor the performance of commissioned content and identify opportunities for improvement or potential areas for expansion.
• Document Business requirements for automation and content data governance initiatives and ensure their implementation.
• Prepare feasibility studies for projects with ability to manage them through implementation (Project Management).
• To ensure that procedures and policies are abided.
Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in business, media, Finance, Management or a related field.
• A minimum of 5 years' experience in a similar role in the media industry.
• Strong process improvement skills, with experience in optimizing business processes.
• Excellent documentation skills, with experience creating detailed step-by-step guides and procedures.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
• Strong business acumen and financial management skills.
• Exposure to a multi-National Business environment with Experience in ERP environment would be highly preferable.
• Proficiency in the following: Word, Excel, MS Projects, Outlook, PowerPoint and Visio.
• Background in financial and operational business modeling.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

As a Business Analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing data from our investors and SME borrowers to provide insights and recommendations to improve our platform's performance. You will work with our product, engineering, and marketing teams to develop strategies and optimize our business processes.
Responsibilities:
• Analyze data from investors and SME borrowers to identify trends and patterns in their behavior.
• Develop reports and dashboards to communicate findings to stakeholders across the organization.
• Work with the product team to identify areas for improvement in our platform and make recommendations for changes.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to develop targeted marketing campaigns based on customer segmentation and behavior.
• Assist in the development of KPIs and metrics to track the performance of the platform and monitor changes over time.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data analysis and business intelligence. Desired Candidate Profile

Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Mathematics, or related field.
2-4 years of experience in a business analyst or data analyst role.
Strong analytical skills and experience with data analysis tools such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau.
Experience with data visualization and dashboard development.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to present complex data in a clear and concise manner.
Knowledge of the fintech industry and experience with crowdfunding or peer-to-peer lending platforms is a plus.
If you are a self-starter, highly analytical, and interested in working in a fast-paced fintech environment, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Roles & Responsibilities

• Managing master data, including creation, updates, and deletion.
• Managing users and user roles.

• Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

As a User Acquisition Representative at Tamatem , you will play a crucial role in driving the success of our mobile games by acquiring and engaging new users. You will be responsible for executing user acquisition campaigns across various advertising platforms, optimizing marketing performance, and analyzing campaign data to acquire high-value users and maximize return on investment for our mobile games. This role requires a strategic mind, analytical skills, and creative flair.
Responsibilities:
Campaign Planning and Execution: Designing, managing, and executing user acquisition campaigns across different digital advertising platforms (e.g., Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Tiktok Ads, Apple Search Ads, ad networks, DSPs, etc) to drive downloads and revenue for our mobile games.
Performance Optimization: Work with fellow UA Managers to set objectives and relevant KPIs. Monitor, analyze, and optimize performance marketing campaigns to ensure achieving main KPIs and maximum ROI.
Drive a relentless culture of experimentation on all key existing channels, while also ideating and establishing new UA funnels for the game(s) you are in charge of.
Budget Management: Assist in managing user acquisition budgets effectively to maximize growth and maintain profitable acquisition channels.
Reporting and Insights: Ensure proper tracking, analysis, and reporting. Generate insightful reports on campaign performance and present findings to the marketing team and key stakeholders. Leverage user behaviour insights and data to personalize campaigns.
Creative Testing: Participate in full-cycle creative production. Work closely with the creative team to develop engaging ad creatives that resonate with the target audience, report on creative performance, and provide data-driven decisions about further creative development.
Conduct continuous A/B tests on creatives, ad copies, audience targeting, and various marketing elements to continuously improve conversion rates and user acquisition metrics.
Market Research: Conduct market research to understand industry trends, competitor strategies, and emerging advertising technologies. Leverage this knowledge to enhance our user acquisition efforts.
Collaboration: Collaborate with external partners and internal teams, including game developers, product managers, and data analysts, to align marketing efforts with game development and product strategies, and foster a collaborative approach to marketing initiatives. Desired Candidate Profile

• Prior experience in performance marketing, user acquisition, or digital advertising for mobile apps/games.
• Analytical Skills: The skill to break complex problems into smaller ones and to enjoy working with data.
• Testing Mentality: Having a testing mindset with the ability to make data-driven/informed decisions and recommendations.
• Spreadsheet Software Fluency in spreadsheet software, including Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets
• Creativity and Get it done mentality: Proactive, problem-solving skills, natural curiosity, and the ability to translate data into creative solutions.
• Passion for Gaming: A genuine interest in the mobile gaming industry and an understanding of gamer preferences and behavior.
• Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to articulate ideas and collaborate effectively within the team. Fluent in English.
Nice to have:
• Previous experience within the mobile gaming industry
• Experience in working with Meta Ads, Google Ads, and SDK networks
• SQL knowledge
• Tableau (or other BI tools) knowledge
• Knowledge of ad monetization tech, tools, and systems
• ASO Knowledge
You will love :
• Our vibrant and fun working environment. We are a curious, hard-working, and energetic group ready to take over the world!
• The continuous learning and career growth
• Our competitive salaries and annual raises.
• Some other COOL perks!

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
 The programme cultivates a network of professionals committed to upholding high integrity standards across the private sector in the region.Across the Gulf Region, there has been a growing recognition of the significance of diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) in the business landscape. Businesses have increasingly understood the importance of embracing diversity in the workplace and incorporating it as a fundamental element of effective corporate governance. Through various convenings, trainings, and research, The Diversity in Business Leadership Programme raises awareness about the value of diversity and inclusion, emphasising their role as pillars of effective corporate governance and drivers for sustainable financial growth.About the Pearl Initiative The Pearl Initiative (PI) is the Gulf Region’s leading independent, private sector-led non-profit organisation working to improve corporate accountability and transparency across a number of programmes, including Anti-Corruption Best Practices, Diversity in Business Leadership, Governance in MSMEs, Governance in Family Firms, Governance in Tech and Governance in Philanthropy. PI was established in 2010 by regional business leaders and the UN Office for Partnerships. PI is the first private non-profit organisation in the Gulf Region to receive special consultative status from the United Nations Economic and Social Council. In 2021, PI launched its updated strategy with bold ambitions for expansion resulting in PI Vision 2025.With over 40 regional and international partners, PI runs programmes focusing on governance-related matters, conducts regionally-based research, convenes business leaders, government and civil society leaders and students to discuss challenges and opportunities in implementing governance best practices in the private sector. PI also runs workshops and trainings to support business professionals as they take the lead in implementing corporate governance, accountability and transparency practices in their organisations. The organisation also supports Gulf-based university students identify and embrace strong ethics and integrity as they embark on their future careers.For more information, please visit www.pearlinitiative.org and follow / subscribe to PI’s Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and YouTube channels by using the following handle @PearlInitiative.Who PI is looking for  We are seeking a highly motivated and organised Senior Programme Associate to help implement customised programmes that promote a corporate culture of accountability, transparency and diversity across the private sector in the Gulf. As the Senior Programme Associate, you will support in designing, developing, and implementing the programmes across four key areas: research, convenings, capacity building, and student engagement.In 2021, the organisation launched its updated strategy, PI Vision 2025, with bold ambitions for expansion. By joining PI at this stage, you will have the opportunity to make a lasting impact on corporate culture in the Gulf region.Primary Duties and ResponsibilitiesKey Responsibilities:Conduct research, collect data, and analyse information, market trends and industry best practices to inform programme decision-making and identify opportunities for innovation.Prepare comprehensive, visually appealing and evidence-based reports that are well-structured, concise, and effectively communicate key findings, insights, and recommendations.Support the dissemination and distribution of reports to relevant stakeholders, ensuring timely and efficient communication of information.Develop and maintain a repository of reports, guides, resources and related documentation for future reference and archival purposes.Assist in monitoring, evaluating, and reporting on programme deliverables, including baseline assessment, progress updates, impact assessment, and KPI measurement.Support the Programme Manager in programme management, aligning with PI’s annual work plan and programme requirements.Collaborate with cross-functional teams within PI to coordinate programme activities and ensure seamless integration with other organisational initiatives.Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and reporting standards to enhance the quality and relevance of the programme deliverables.Ensure the database of programme partners and stakeholders is up to date.Essential Professional Qualifications, Experience and SkillsBachelor’s degree in International Development, Economics or other Social SciencesMinimum of 5 years’ experience in programme delivery & design, and/or executive level research and writing, with at keast 3 years working in the Gulf region.Superior written and verbal communication skills in English and Arabic.Up-to-date knowledge of trends and norms within the private sector in the Gulf region.Proficient in using Microsoft Office, CRM software, Zoom and survey programmes.Personal AttributesTo be successful in this role, you must possess the following qualities:Proficient Researcher: We are looking for an individual with exceptional research skills, capable of finding relevant and reliable information from a wide range of sources. You will be expected to navigate databases, conduct thorough online searches, and access various repositories to gather up-to-date information that will inform our programme, reports and guides.Persuasive Wordsmith: We are looking for a talented individual with strong report-writing skills that can bring our programme’s research, achievements and insights to life. Your compelling writing will be instrumental in shaping our stakeholders’ understanding and inspiring action towards our goals.Effective Project Management: We are seeking a detail-oriented candidate with strong project management skills. You will need to plan, organise, and execute projects efficiently within set deadlines and budgetary constraints.Strong Data Analyst: We are seeking someone with strong skills in data analysis, interpretation, and presentation.Self-Starter: We need someone who can take the initiative and work independently.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

About us
Tabby creates financial freedom in the way people shop, earn and save by reshaping their relationship with money. Over 4,500,000 active users choose Tabby to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money.
Over 15,000 global brands and small businesses, including H&M, Adidas, IKEA, SHEIN, noon, and Bloomingdale s use Tabby s technology to accelerate growth and gain loyal customers by offering flexible payments online and in stores. Tabby is active in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt and Kuwait and backed by leading investors including Sequoia Capital India, STV, PayPal Ventures, Mubadala Investment Capital, Arbor Ventures and others.
About the role
We're looking for someone who is passionate about what we're doing within the Buy Now Pay Later landscape. There's a real appetite from both consumers and retailers to utilize the service, and reap the benefits that this would offer them. We want to keep this momentum; grow and enhance our offering. We need to harness the power of data and insights to shape our thinking, to collaborate with partners & colleagues to build something that will facilitate real growth and scalability.
You will work in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving environment across all areas of the business including data analysis and modeling, risk assessment and product management. You will work closely with our Head of Risk and Co Founders to control our risk portfolio and implement new features. You will develop in a culture where we value curiosity, fun, experimentation, and data-driven decision making.
You ll be working in a dynamic, rapidly evolving environment with the following responsibilities:
• Developing all underwriting work needed to deploy decisioning models and logic.
• Maintaining and consistently iterating/improving our risk assessment models and algorithms.
• Setting and monitoring the credit risk control framework, various KPIs to inform decisions and support recommendations across the business.
• Designing and executing on our credit limit modeling & ensuring compliancy to the related policies.
• Building and managing a team of high performing data analysts.
You should apply if you have
• A bachelor s degree in Mathematics, Computer Science or a related technical eld.
• Strong analytical and data capabilities, backed up by technical coding skills.
• SQL is a must-have, Python is a plus.
• Visualisation technologies such as Tableau is a plus.
• 3+ years of working within a fintech would be a huge bonus.
• Proven track record as a leader of a high performing team.
• Experience with modeling and machine learning techniques as a plus.
• You thrive in ambiguous environments. Ask incisive questions and have an intellectual curiosity. You have a structured approach to problem solving alongside strong quantitative skills.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills, including an ability to effectively lead interactions with both business and technical teams.
• A real excitement for what we re doing here at Tabby.
What you can expect
• We offer flexible working hours and trust you to work enough hours to do your job well, at times that suit you and your team.
• A working environment that gives you autonomy and responsibility from day one.
• You should be comfortable with the idea that the quality of your work will influence the shape of your career.
• Participation in company s employee stock options program.
• Health Insurance
We are passionate about creating an inclusive, high-performing workplace that gives people from all backgrounds the support they need to thrive, grow and meet their goals (whatever they may be).
If this sounds exciting to you, we d love to hear from you!

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
You will be responsible for driving traffic, generating leads or conversions, through effective media buying and campaign management techniques.
This role requires a deep understanding of media buying platforms, strong analytical skills, and a keen eye for data-driven decision-making.
Located in ElSheikh Zayed, 6th of October City (Cairo, Egypt), as part of the AKQA team, you ll work in a meritocratic culture surrounded by some of the brightest minds in their fields. You ll also have the opportunity to learn and grow within a creative and technically advanced team, and have access to ongoing personal and professional development.

ROLE REQUIREMENTS
• Develop and implement performance marketing strategies to drive traffic, leads, and conversions, considering target audience, budget, and campaign objectives.
• Manage and optimize online marketing campaigns across paid search, paid social, display, and other digital advertising channels.
• Able to conduct a thorough research to come up with audience profiles based on the given brief.
• Collaborate with creative teams to develop compelling and highly optimized ad copy, visuals, and landing pages to improve campaign performance.
• Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and implement robust tracking systems to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and regularly provide detailed reports to stakeholders.
• Continuous monitoring of campaign performance, including budget utilization, audience targeting, cost-per-acquisition, return on ad spend, and other relevant metrics.
• Conduct A/B testing and data analysis to improve campaign performance, optimize bidding strategies, keywords, ad placements, and targeting.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new media channels, and emerging technologies to ensure the adoption of innovative and effective strategies.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams including data analysts, creative teams, and account managers to align marketing efforts and achieve business goals.
QUALITIES AND CHARACTERISTICS
• Proven experience in planning, executing, and optimizing performance marketing campaigns across various digital advertising channels.
• Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret and act on data-driven insights.
• Proficiency in using digital advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Business Manager, TikTok Ad Manager, and Google Marketing Platform.
• Familiarity with analytics tools like Google Analytics.
• Familiarity with conversion tracking implementation platforms like Google Tag manager.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly articulate complex marketing concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
• Proven track record of effectively managing and coordinating multiple projects, meeting deadlines, and achieving targets.
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
• Detail-oriented mindset with the ability to manage budgets and prioritize tasks effectively.
• Professional level communication skills in both Arabic and English.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB SUMMARY:
The Smart City Delivery Manager plays a pivotal role in the planning, execution, and successful delivery of smart city initiatives specially in Security cameras. This role involves coordinating cross-functional teams, managing budgets, and ensuring that smart city projects align with the city's strategic goals and enhance the quality of life for its residents.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Develop and execute a strategic roadmap for the city's smart city initiatives, aligning them with broader urban development goals.
• Define project objectives, scope, budgets, and timelines for individual smart city projects.
• Collaborate with government agencies, private-sector partners, community organizations, and residents to gather input and build support for smart city projects.
• Foster strong relationships with key stakeholders and ensure effective communication throughout the project lifecycle.
• Lead cross-functional project teams, including engineers, architects, data analysts, and other professionals.
• Establish clear project goals, monitor progress, identify risks, and implement mitigation strategies to ensure project success.
• Supervise the deployment and maintenance of smart city technologies, such as IoT sensors, Security cameras, data analytics platforms, and communication networks.
• Manage project budgets, allocate resources efficiently, and track expenditures to stay within budget constraints.
• Identify opportunities for cost savings and optimization without compromising project quality.
• Ensure that all smart city projects comply with relevant regulations, standards, and permits.
• Stay informed about emerging regulations and adjust project plans as needed.
• Implement data-driven decision-making processes and monitor project performance through key performance indicators (KPIs).
• Use data analytics to identify trends, assess the impact of initiatives, and make continuous improvements.
KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE:
• Bachelor's or master's degree in project management, or a related field.
• Proven experience in project management, particularly in overseeing complex smart city projects.
• Experience managing large scale Physical Infrastructure Projects
• Strong understanding of smart city technologies, including IoT, data analytics, and cloud /security.
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
• Proficiency in project management software and tools.
Vertical:
Technology

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Pixelogic Media Partners, LLC provides technology solutions to the entertainment industry. We are responsible for helping Hollywood Studios and content owners to get their content to global audiences by providing all language services including scripting, subtitling, access services, and dubbing. Our products and services span the digital spectrum, from enhanced extras packages promoting digital purchase to physical disc authoring.
Our clients include major Hollywood studios and dozens of independent studios. To date, we have delivered thousands of titles to iTunes, Google, Netflix, Amazon, and others. We have created a significant percentage of iTunes Extras titles available on the App Store, developed the specification of and delivered the first Cross-Platform Extras titles, and authored more than eight-thousand DVDs, two-thousand Blu-rays, as well as award-winning tablet and mobile apps.
Experience start-up momentum with us and be part of building innovative solutions to service our clients in the entertainment industry with their media distribution needs. Join us if you are passionate about entertainment, innovation, and customer service excellence!
Responsibilities:
• Manage and train team of revenue analyst that support the company s various lines of businesses.
• Develop policies and procedures and drive efficiencies and process improvements within the team s work streams.
• Provide business units with analysis and develop metrics to help drive strategic growth.
• Take an active role in the broader Finance team, helping smooth implementation of and adherence to new finance requirements, systems and processes.
• Subject matter expert on customer rate cards and business workflows.
• Work closely with Corporate Accounting team during month end close to ensure complete and accurate revenue accrual data by business unit, location, and customer.
• Other duties and tasks that might be assigned from time to time. Desired Candidate Profile
• Bachelor s degree in Business, Finance or Accounting; MBA / CMA is a plus.
• 10 years of experience in financial planning & analysis.
• FP&A experience gained within established businesses.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
• Superior analysis skills.
• Enthusiasm for solving problems and working collaboratively.
• Independent/Self-starter with high attention to details.
• Proven working experience as a data analyst.
• Advance Microsoft Excel skills and ability to work with/analyze large volumes of data.
• Demonstrated organizational skills to manage workload, multiple priorities, and competing time demands to meet deadlines.
• Strong team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills who collaborates cross functionally and with individuals from different backgrounds and with different levels of experience.
• Must be flexible with availability via phone, email and text (AM, PM, weekends).

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities



Summary



As a Project Manager in the Customer & Digital Department, you will play a pivotal role in driving customer experience (CX) initiatives across our complete offering.



Key Accountabilities and Responsibilities



Project Management:



• Lead and oversee a diverse portfolio of customer experience projects, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.
• Collaborate with stakeholders from various business units to gather project requirements, define project scope, and establish clear objectives and deliverables.
• Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation.
• Proactively identify project risks and issues, and implement mitigation strategies to ensure successful project outcomes.
• Communicate project progress, status, and challenges to key stakeholders and senior management in a clear and concise manner.



Cross-Functional Collaboration:



• Work closely with the Strategy lead, Design Lead and product owners to align CX projects with the overall customer experience strategy.
• Foster collaboration among cross-functional teams, including energy experts, designers, data analysts, developers, and customer care representatives, to drive project success.
• Act as the bridge between the CX team and other departments, facilitating seamless communication and coordination.



Management



• Provide leadership and direction to the development team, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.
• Ensure effective communication and coordination between cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
• Act as a mentor to junior team members, providing guidance and support in their professional development.



CX Strategy and Innovation:



• Stay abreast of industry trends and best practices in customer experience, design methodologies, and sustainable living initiatives.
• Contribute to trend research and analysis, providing insights to inform CX strategy and future project planning.
• Champion innovation and continuous improvement, exploring new ways to enhance customer satisfaction and engagement.



Background, Skills



• Proven experience as a Project Manager, successfully delivering customer experience projects or related initiatives.
• Solid understanding of CX principles, user experience (UX), user interface (UI), and design methodologies.
• Familiarity with agile project management methodologies and tools.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Strong organizational and analytical skills, with a keen eye for detail.
• Passionate about sustainability and contributing to a greener future.



Qualifications



• Bachelor or master s degree.
• 5+ years of experience
• Pragmatic goal orientated attitude

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

About Us
Udacity is on a mission to change lives, businesses and nations through radical talent transformation in digital technologies. We offer a unique and immersive online learning platform, powering corporate technical training in fields such as Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Autonomous Systems, Cloud Computing and more. Our rapidly growing global organization is revolutionizing how the enterprise market bridges the talent shortage and skills gaps during their digital transformation journey. Udacity is proud to be backed by respected investors like Andreessen Horowitz, Charles River Ventures, Bertelsmann and Drive Capital, among other leading VC firms, and provides a powerful and differentiated solution inside of a $32b total addressable market opportunity. Udacity has more than 100 enterprise customers including Airbus, Bertelsmann, BNP Paribas, Leidos, Mazda, and the United States Air Force.
Udacity's mission is to train the world s workforce in the careers of the future. We partner with leading companies to learn how technology is transforming industries, then teach the critical tech skills that individuals need for new and better jobs, and companies are looking for in their workforce. With Nanodegree programs ranging from AI and Azure to Data Science, Robotic Process Automation, and Cybersecurity, our online training platform helps even the busiest learners prepare themselves for the most in-demand tech roles.
Udacity's unique learning model of real-world projects and experts and mentors available 24/7 enables an unprecedented degree of engagement with our students, and we are with them through every step of their learning journey from the first moment a marketing team member might answer a question, to the penultimate moment when a career team member receives word that a graduate has gotten a new job. Always putting Students First guides us as we continue our mission to bring the highest-quality learning possible, to as many learners as we can possibly reach.
Career mentors are industry professionals who provide world-class career support to our students in their Nanodegree journey or beyond. All our mentors are handpicked through a rigorous selection process so that we can truly be #studentfirst.
JOIN THE LEAGUE TODAY
Required skills/qualifications:
• Residing in Saudi Arabia is a must
• Bilingual in Arabic and English
• 2+ Years of Technical Experience in the field of Data Science (Data Analyst/Programming for Data Science/Business Analytics) is a must
• Experience in teaching the basics of career development concepts and public speaking is an added plus
• Basic knowledge of recruitment and headhunting skills
• English proficiency both written and spoken
• Strong interpersonal and leadership skills to lead and coach a group of students and build a strong community
• Familiarity with the GCC market s general careers and employment map and characteristics
• Ability to assist Udacity students in identifying personal goals, developing leadership skills, and planning career moves
• Experience in quick resume and LinkedIn profiles screening
• Completion of one of Udacity Nanodegree programs is a plus
• Strong written and verbal communication including PowerPoint presentations
Responsibilities:
• Attend bi-weekly meetings with Udacity careers ops for discussing students progress
• Conduct webinars and/or sessions to deliver careers and initial freelancing experience to Udacity learners
• Support Udacity learners and build a strong sense of community through motivational posts, sharing your knowledge, sharing helpful articles, and answering students questions
• Support in increasing the program s survey responses
• Occasionally assisting with hiring partners employment requests (announcements, filtration, and screening)
Why should you apply?
• Gain recognition for your knowledge and leadership
• Network with other top-notch mentors
• Earn additional income
• Contribute to a vibrant, global student community
• Stay updated on the latest in cutting-edge technologies
There are only a few positions , so please don t wait too long to apply!
Before applying, we would request you to kindly complete the General Information Form if you haven't filled it already.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
The purpose of this role is to work closely with the Business Directors to help push the creative boundaries of the agency output for existing clients and new business opportunities. Present innovative and differentiating ideas and concepts to clients. They will be responsible for the creative ownership, creative strategic development and overall concept development.
Job Title:
Creative Strategy Lead
Job Description:
Job Description:
CREATIVE
• Develop consistently superior visual and messaging content to support clients overarching strategic messaging
• Lead the strategic thinking for the brand
• Write effective integrated briefs and work directly with creative teams, data analysts and media colleagues to develop strong creative ideas that can be effectively deployed for the client and brand
• Show leadership in executing fresh, innovative concepts that enhance response strategies and achieve client objectives
• Collaborate with our DNA (Data & Analysis) and media teams to spot strategic opportunities and fuel creativity
• Works with MENA creative team members - Creative Directors, senior team members and client teams to create appropriate, workable ways to express and enhance the client s communication needs and achieve key strategic initiatives
• Guide teams through creative conceptualizing, execution and delivery in accordance with departmental processes
• Know all pertinent industry, channel, client, and product information, such as audience insights, product benefits, offers, KPIs, brand standards and production specifications
• Responsible for current knowledge and understanding of emerging trends and technologies and the ability to institute best practices for digital and traditional marketing products
CLIENT CONTACT
• Develop and present creative concepts to clients
• Communicate creative rationale to clients, defend the work and articulate reasons behind each choice
• Work with client teams to move their agenda forward and provide solutions
• Participate in pitch strategy and demonstrate an ability to articulate those strategies
CREATIVE TEAM LEADERSHIP DUTIES
• Collaborate with Account team members to identify questions and pertinent project information needed to execute assignments
• Work with Account leads to assign work
• Manage KSA Strategists and Copyrighters to ensure their work meets the agency standards, including the ability to clearly articulate feedback and provide constructive oversite that elevates the creative product
• Mentor and inspire teams to perform at the maximum of their abilities and foster reputation as problem solvers
• Assure that creative work meets client objectives, follows strategies aligned to the brief and meets deadlines on budget
About Dentsu International
Part of the dentsu Group, dentsu international is a network designed for what s next, helping clients predict and plan for disruptive future opportunities and create new paths to growth in a sustainable economy. Dentsu delivers people-focused solutions and services to drive better business and societal outcomes. This is delivered through five global leadership brands - Carat, dentsu Creative, dentsu X, iProspect and Merkle, each with deep specialisms.
Dentsu international s radically collaborative team of diverse creators unifies people, clients and capabilities through horizontal creativity to help clients create culture, change society, and invent the future.
Powered by 100% renewable energy, dentsu international operates in over 145 markets worldwide with more than 46,000 dedicated specialists, and partners with 95 of the top 100 global advertisers.
www.dentsu.com
About Dentsu Group (dentsu)
Led by dentsu Group Inc. (Tokyo: 4324; ISIN: JP3551520004), a pure holding company established on January 1, 2020, the dentsu Group encompasses two operational networks: dentsu japan network, which oversees dentsu s agency operations in Japan, and dentsu international, its international business headquarters in London, which oversees dentsu s agency operations outside of Japan.
With a strong presence in approximately 145 countries and regions across five continents and with 65,000 dedicated professionals, the dentsu Group provides a comprehensive range of client-centric integrated communications, media and digital services through its five leadership brands Carat, dentsu X, iProspect, dentsu Creative, and Merkle as well as through dentsu Japan Network companies, including dentsu Inc., the world s largest single brand agency with a history of innovation. The Group is also active in the production and marketing of sports and entertainment content on a global scale. Inclusion and Diversity
We re proud to be different and that starts with our people. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone. We won t define people by their race, gender, sexual orientation, age or disability. Individuality is what makes us great, we want everyone to bring their full self to work and create something amazing. That s what we care about. So, whether you re joining us, or looking to move to a different part of the business, we work hard to make sure we create equal opportunities for everyone.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for an experienced C Engineer to join our team in Abu Dhabi, UAE.
Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, optimize and integrate embedded software for radio frequency related applications
• Participate in the product development lifecycle from inception and design to bring-up, optimization, verification
• Provide a software abstraction layer to seamlessly support a variety of hardware configurations
• Design and implement test interfaces
Requirements:
• B.Sc. in Electronic Engineering or Computer Science or similar
• 10 years of proven experience in Embedded/Firmware programming
• Extensive proven experience programming microcontrollers and other embedded devices in C
• Extensive experience with RTOSes such as FreeRTOS, VxWorks, Zephyr
• Advance understanding and extensive experience with the following peripheral interfaces: UART, I2C, SPI, CAN
• Experience with debugging firmware and communication buses using lab equipment (logic analyzers, oscilloscopes )
• DSP knowledge as well as FPGA programming is desired but not required
• C and other OOP languages ability desired but not required
Other requirements:
• Passion for Firmware Development and Technology in general
• Flexible attitude, ability to perform under pressure
• Good level of spoken and written English language (upper-intermediate)
About us
BeamTrail works towards delivering the best solutions and user experience for governmental organizations, empowering teams of data analysts to quickly identify and resolve issues faster and more efficiently while allowing managers to optimize operations.
BeamTrail is comprised of talented, creative and dedicated individuals with a passion for delivering innovative solutions to the market. At BeamTrail, we recognize that every employee s contributions are integral to our company s growth and success. To find and acquire the best and brightest talent around the globe, we offer a challenging work environment, competitive compensation and benefits, and rewarding career opportunities.
We are young, we are growing and we are hiring!
If this particular role is not a good match for your skills but you think that your expertise may be valuable for our success, and you would like to join our team in Abu Dhabi, we invite you to visit our main job board at https://beamtrail.bamboohr.com/jobs , apply for any other better suited role or use the "Others" vacancy to submit your generic application (use the comments section to tell us why we should hire you!). We will be happy to review and have a chat and see how you can fit into our team!

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Job Description for Quality Assurance Lead

Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lead QA Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for leading the QA team in ensuring the quality of our software products by designing and implementing tests, developing test plans and test cases, and executing them to identify any defects or bugs. As a Lead QA Engineer, you will work closely with our development and product teams to ensure that our products meet the highest standards of quality.
Responsibilities:


Lead and manage a team of QA engineers to ensure the quality of our hardware with software products to cover all business cases requirement.

Design and develop test plans and test cases based on functional and technical specifications.

Execute test cases and document defects, bugs and issues found during testing.

Work closely with the development team (hardware or software) to reproduce and debug defects.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the quality of our software products.

Continuously improve testing processes, tools, and methodologies.

Participate in the development of tests using test automation frameworks.

Provide feedback on the quality of the product and its user experience.

Act as a point of contact for all quality-related matters and escalate issues as necessary.

Define and implement metrics to measure the quality of our software products.

Prepare and present reports on the quality of our software products to management.
Requirements:


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field.

At least 6 years of experience in software testing and quality assurance.

Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies, tools, and processes.

Experience with manual and automated testing techniques.

Experience in test automation frameworks, scripting languages (Python, Ruby, etc.).

Ability to write and execute SQL queries to verify data.

Experience in Agile methodologies.

Experience in JIRA is a must.

Experience with automated and performance testing tool (e.g., JMeter, Load Runner)

Good communication and collaboration skills.

Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Previous experience leading a team of QA engineers.

Preferred Qualifications:


Experience with web and mobile testing.

Experience with CI/CD pipelines and deployment processes.

Knowledge of security testing and performance testing.

ISTQB Certification.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Solution Architect
Location: Dubai
Duration: 12 Months
Responsibilities:
The solution architect s responsibilities include gathering requirements and functional specifications, assessing the current software systems in place to identify areas in need of improvement, and overseeing development teams. You should also be able to regularly update the company on any developments in systems architecture projects. As a solution architect, you should be able to integrate any updated specifications and requirements into the systems architecture.

Collaborate with clients and stakeholders to understand their needs and define project requirements.
Design software solutions that meet the needs of clients and align with business goals.
Create architectural diagrams, specifications, and technical documentation to guide development teams.
Oversee the development process, ensuring that it adheres to the project s architectural standards and best practices.
Provide technical guidance to development teams, ensuring that they are building solutions that meet the project s requirements.
Evaluate third-party technologies and integrate them into the project as needed.
Identify and mitigate technical risks throughout the project s lifecycle.
Ensure that software solutions are scalable, secure, and maintainable.
Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in software architecture and development.

Requirements:
Bachelor s degree in computer science or related field.
7+ years of experience in software development or software architecture.
Strong technical expertise in software development, including experience with multiple programming languages, databases, and web technologies.
Experience in designing and implementing complex software systems.
Strong communication skills, including the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Leadership skills, including the ability to mentor and guide development teams.
Ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment with multiple stakeholders.
Experience with Agile development methodologies.
Recent and in-depth architectural experience in Azure and AWS
Experience with DevOps practices and tools.
Assessing the business impact that certain technical choices have.
Providing updates to stakeholders on product development processes, costs, and budgets.
Previous project management experience is advantageous.
In-depth understanding of programming languages (Java, JavaScript).
Sound knowledge of various operating systems and databases.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
You will be responsible for developing and testing electronic products and systems for an extensive range of projects. These would include designing, controlling electrical systems and products, and developing and manufacturing processes as needed. Your job would also include managing engineering projects and delivering them on time, defining customer needs and requirements, and ensuring installation and applications are in line with in-house requirements as well as customer needs. You will collaborate with other engineers and departments on a daily, performing quality and performance analysis, summarizing data and report on test results; monitoring maintenance and inspection plans, and ensuring projects are running on time.
Duties and Responsibilities
Designing, inspecting, testing, and updating electronic systems, components, equipment, and software.
Liaising with engineers, other professionals, as well as clients to ensure quality projects are completed to specifications.
Designing electrical components as per the specifications provided.
Ensuring all equipment and products meet health and safety regulations.
Observing existing processes and making recommendations for improvement.
Developing effective maintenance, testing, and quality control procedures.
Showing initiative and keeping up with advancements in Electronics.
Representing the company at conferences and delivering presentations if required.
Monitoring processes, systems, and staff, and punctually identifying problems.
Establishing relationships with staff, vendors, suppliers, and other professionals in the field.
Writing specifications, instructions, and reports, and handling other required administrative duties.
Creating and maintaining reports on daily operations
Component selection and feasibility studies to ensure we have reliable and stable component sources.
Experience and Requirements
Bachelor s degree in Electronic/Electrical or Automation Engineering with a focus area in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
C/C++ experience.
Good knowledge of engineering design programs such as KiCad Altium Designer, and Spice.
Attentive to detail and critically minded.

What we are offering:

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for a strategy specialist to design and implement actionable marketing strategies and tactics to meet defined goals and objectives. Typically review and analyze market data and leverage it into well-defined goals for multi-media print, publications, electronic communications, public relations, or special events, and also design and execute marketing strategies while providing strategic consultation and services to ensure that marketing and organizational decision-making are supported by accurate data and analyses.
Strategy specialists will develop timely and cost-effective marketing plans for programs and products and then develop and implement strategies for the acquisition of prospects. A strategy specialist may personally manage marketing for targeted audiences within diverse program areas and perform detailed analytics, including internal or external financial, operational, and market data, and use that data to summarize key insights for senior leadership.
Strategy specialists will work with functional teams to achieve objectives, such as distributing metrics for executives and conducting presentations, and they must be able to coordinate the implementation of projects by facilitating meetings and gaining consensus. A bachelor's degree in a business-related field and two to three years of prior experience are generally required for this position.
Responsibilities:
Understand and shape the company s strategy and mission
Develop plans to materialize strategy and analyze business proposals
Research competition to identify threats and opportunities
Assess the company s operational and strategic performance
Align processes, resources-planning, and department goals with the overall strategy
Provide support and insight into significant organizational changes (e.g. shift in strategic focus, mergers, and acquisitions)
Educate senior executives in making effective decisions
Construct forecasts and analytical models
Monitor and analyze industry trends and market changes
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in business administration or related field.
Must be fluent in English.
Experience in business development or research.
Excellent interpersonal skills.
Familiar with the technologies MS Word and PowerPoint, Power BI, Excel, etc.
Strong leadership skills.
Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills.
Certificates in Strategic management are preferred like Strategy and Business Planning Professional (SBP), Balanced Scorecard Professional (BSP).
Strong understanding of strategic roadmap development, implementation, and evaluation.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description: Summary:
The System Management position in Abu Dhabi, UAE, within the aviation and airport management industry, involves managing and overseeing various systems used in airport operations. This role requires strong technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and a comprehensive understanding of airport systems, technology infrastructure, and data management.
Key Responsibilities:
System Administration: The System Manager is responsible for the administration and maintenance of various airport systems, including flight information systems, passenger processing systems, baggage handling systems, security systems, and other critical infrastructure. They ensure system availability, performance, and reliability.
System Upgrades and Integration: The System Manager oversees system upgrades, enhancements, and integrations. They collaborate with vendors, IT teams, and other stakeholders to plan and execute system upgrades, ensuring minimal disruption to operations. They coordinate testing, training, and implementation processes.
System Monitoring and Troubleshooting: Monitoring system performance and addressing issues promptly is essential. The System Manager implements monitoring tools and processes to proactively identify and resolve system-related problems. They troubleshoot technical issues, coordinate with IT support, and ensure timely resolution of system failures.
Data Management: Effective data management is crucial. The System Manager ensures accurate and secure data handling, including data backups, data integrity checks, and data protection measures. They collaborate with stakeholders to define data requirements, implement data governance practices, and support data analysis and reporting.
System Security and Compliance: The System Manager ensures system security and compliance with industry standards and regulations. They implement security measures, access controls, and audit trails to protect sensitive data and mitigate cybersecurity risks. They collaborate with IT and security teams to address vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
System Training and Documentation: The System Manager provides training and documentation to system users, ensuring their understanding of system functionalities and procedures. They develop user manuals, standard operating procedures, and training materials to support system adoption and proficiency.
System Performance Analysis and Improvement: The System Manager analyzes system performance metrics, identifies areas for improvement, and recommends system enhancements. They collaborate with stakeholders to optimize system performance, streamline processes, and enhance operational efficiency. Desired Candidate Profile
Job Requirement: Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (preferred) Strong knowledge of airport systems and technology infrastructure Technical expertise in system administration and troubleshooting Problem-solving and analytical skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Familiarity with data management principles and practices Understanding of system security and compliance requirements Experience in system administration or related roles in the aviation industry (preferred) Knowledge of airport operations and processes (preferred) If you have a passion for technology, possess strong technical skills, and enjoy working in a dynamic environment, this System Management role in Abu Dhabi, UAE, offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the efficient management of airport systems within the field of aviation and airport management.

dmg events is an international exhibitions and publishing company. We attract more than 425,000 visitors to our global portfolio of 80 exhibitions each year. Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
The Head of Marketing, Cosmoprof & CPHI, will report into the Group Director and will manage a diverse team based in Riyadh. The individual will be a highly motivated, dynamic marketing leader with a track record of commercial collaboration to develop products and positioning reflective of customer demand.
Managing a diverse team of managers, marketing executives and specialist functions the Head of Marketing will be a skilled marketing strategist and be able to drive creativity and enthusiasm in others. The individual needs to be analytical and data orientated with a history of testing and optimisation, but with creative flair and exceptional attention to detail. The candidate should have extensive experience of digital marketing and marketing technology and be accustomed to delivering in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. The individual must be extremely adaptable, accustomed to working with differing market dynamics and be able to guide marketers and steer campaign strategy accordingly.
Key Performance Indicators
• Working alongside commercial leads to develop value propositions and go-to-market strategy
• Ongoing customer insight and engagement strategies
• Overseeing delivery of marketing campaigns in line with business objectives
• Adherence to timelines and budgets
• Marketing KPI report
• To manage a cross functional marketing team which includes marketers from all backgrounds with a diverse range of skills and training
• To design and deliver campaigns for specific projects as and where required
• To act as a change management ambassador, demonstrating a positive and constructive attitude towards challenges and change
Key Responsibilities
LEADERSHIP
• Recommend team structures and delivery solutions based on requirements
• Line manage senior marketers and specialists working across a range of events
• Work with Group Director to ensure right structure, specialisms and level of resources to meet agreed KPI s
• Provide guidance, feedback and inspiration to line reports
• Champion the adoption and optimisation of marketing technology solutions and digital marketing more broadly
• Work with line reports to ensure successful delivery of marketing campaigns in line with agreed KPI s, event and divisional strategy
• Work with line reports to develop skills and competencies and ensure they have a clear development roadmap
• Ensure line reports are competent managers and have the skills and training required to manage junior team members or specialists
• Ensure adoption and optimisation of marketing technology solutions, identify training needs and ensure line reports are technically proficient
• Reflect the high-performance culture of the marketing team
ANALYSIS & INSIGHT
• Monitor campaign performance by supervising the production of relevant and timely reports. Recommend changes to campaign execution based on data insights
• Share relevant insights with sales, event team and senior management to drive revenues or pursue new opportunities
• Analyse and report trends over time and use these insights to build more effective campaigns
• Ensure relevant and timely data is captured (onsite & post show surveys, registration forms, industry research etc)
• Work with internal teams to ensure data governance and data management policies are adhered to
• Ensure delivery and accuracy of pre-agreed reports during and post campaign to monitor channel effectiveness and ROI
• Use recommended campaign analytics dashboards to monitor performance
• Build a culture of testing and metrics-driven decision making in the teams
• Share case studies with marketers within the team, division and Informa Markets
PLANNING & CAMPAIGN MANAGEMENT
• Work with marketing managers/wider team to plan product marketing campaigns to meet strategic objectives for exhibitions and virtual/hybrid events
• Monitor operational implementation plans and ensure adherence to deadlines (including Gantt charts, Time & Action Plans, Content Calendars, Budget Trackers)
• Monitor engagement with target media, associations, industry partners and social media influencers and help the team determine how they fit within the integrated campaign
• Assist marketing managers with the development of marketing budgets in line with plans and ensure budget trackers are kept up to date
• Recommend external suppliers and ensure adherence to contractual terms and delivery
• Work with internal teams and external agencies to deliver digital marketing, social media and PR in line with marketing plans to hit agreed KPI's
• Ensure optimisation of spend across marketing channels
• Agree paid media requirements and guide the negotiation of media buying (either directly or through an agency)
• Recommend website strategy to maximise relevant traffic and conversion
MARKETING EXECUTION
• Together with the marketing managers identify target universe and key segments within target universe
• Guide the team in developing personas, value propositions and messaging for each of the key segments
• Ensure that timely, relevant communications are sent through full mix of channels and that the team are optimising the effectiveness of these channels
• Monitor and recommend adjustments to the digital marketing activity based on performance metrics
• Input into the Content Calendar to ensure delivery through the most relevant channels (email marketing, social media, digital marketing, direct mail etc)
• Input into the PR plan (internal or external) and liaise with the event manager/event director
• Establish relationships with and manage strategically important partners to ensure maximum exposure at lowest cost to show budget
• Ensure the maintenance of active social media channels in line with market expectations, monitor engagement and maximise conversion
• Oversee the design and production of all marketing collateral to be determined within the marketing plan
• Ensure all marketing collateral, email marketing, website content and digital marketing is thoroughly proofed, adheres to brand guidelines and agreed Informa standards Desired Candidate Profile
Qualifications
Qualifications & experience
• Experience in a start-up environment and/or scaling a new business is desirable
Skills & qualities
• Good written and oral communication skills in both Arabic and English is essential
• Excellent quantitative skills
• Excellent Excel, PowerPoint and financial modelling skills
• Strong analytical and presentation skills
• Good attention to detail and accuracy.
• Self-starter with proactive nature, and ability to work autonomously
• Experience using SAP, TM1 (IBM) and/or Oracle would be advantageous
• Highly collaborative
• Thrives on constant change.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

• Are you keen in being part of an organization to save marine life?
• Are you interested in joining a huge project for Coral Reefs and Sea Turtles?
About Our Client
A Saudi Government entity which is working on a large scale project for Coral Reef & Sea Turtle Conservation in the Red Sea. This entity aims to attain the 2030 vision of Saudi Arabia wherein the country is closer to contributing towards a greener and sustainable planet. The organization is planning and implementing effective programs with best global experts on coral reefs and turtle to train the local talent. Furthermore, the entity aims to promote innovation in environmental conservation by driving research, community engagement, strategic partnerships and effective coordination with other stakeholders.

Job Description
• Designs, develops, and maintains GIS applications; trains GIS end-users and provides technical support for apps; resolves conflicting data, mapping, and connectivity issues through office or field investigation; fulfills spatial information and web mapping requests as needed.
• Support project managers identify the environmental constrains of fieldwork plans using spatial analysis
• Prepare maps and dashboard reports for reporting, presentations, and workshops
• Understand the new trends in spatial industry and communicate its relevance with project managers

The Successful Applicant
• Must have a Master's or Bachelor's Degree, GIS, geography, environmental studies, or related field with demonstrated capabilities in GIS

• Good written and oral communication skills; strong interpersonal skills to support internal customers at all levels from various departments within our organization.

The opportunity to work in a government entity that offers a fulfilling career in a competing organization where you will be part of a dynamic and ambitious team.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities

Job Description
We are seeking an experienced ERP Specialist to join our team and manage our enterprise resource planning systems. The ERP Specialist will play a key role in implementing, configuring, maintaining, and optimizing our ERP software to streamline business processes and enhance data management. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of ERP systems and strong problem-solving skills.
Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze business requirements for the ERP system.
• Customize and configure the ERP software to match the organization's processes, integrating various modules as needed.
• Ensure data migration from legacy systems to the ERP platform, validating accuracy and completeness.
• Monitor the ERP system's performance, identifying and resolving any technical issues or glitches that arise.
• Manage system upgrades, patches, and updates to keep the ERP software current and secure.
• Implement data integrity measures and perform routine data audits to ensure accuracy.
• Provide comprehensive training to end-users on how to effectively navigate and use the ERP system.
• Offer responsive user support by addressing inquiries, troubleshooting issues, and providing solutions.
• Develop user manuals and guides to assist users in utilizing the ERP system's capabilities.
• Collaborate with stakeholders to evaluate existing business processes and identify areas for enhancement using the ERP system.
• Design and implement process improvements, leveraging the ERP software's functionalities.
• Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the impact of process changes.
• Extract, analyze, and interpret data from the ERP system to generate reports and insights for decision-making.
• Create customized reports and dashboards tailored to different departments' needs.
• Collaborate with data analysts to identify trends and opportunities for business growth.
• Integrate the ERP system with other applications and tools used within the organization's technology ecosystem.
• Ensure smooth data flow between the ERP system and other systems through effective interfaces.
• Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues as they arise.
• Work closely with ERP vendors and third-party providers to address technical concerns, upgrades, and improvements.
• Monitor vendor performance, ensuring compliance with service level agreements (SLAs).
Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Administration, or a related field. Master's degree may be advantageous.
• Proven experience (typically 3+ years) in ERP system management, configuration, and optimization.
• Proficiency in working with popular ERP systems such as SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics, etc.
• Strong understanding of business processes across multiple functional areas.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical thinking.
• Effective communication and interpersonal abilities.
• Project management skills to oversee implementation and upgrades.
• Ability to adapt to changing technologies and business requirements.

Provides expert knowledge and experience in running a comprehensive Quality Operations section, comprised of a data management system. Identify processes and procedures required to execute the project in compliance with project specifications, standards and safety and security requirements, and review/update Work-center Plans, Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Internal Operating Procedures (IOP) and Work Instructions (WI), to ensure they provide proper operational information and direction for performing all tasks.
